name: Daniel Campbell
text: Did a good job at a reasonable price.

name: Cynthia Wilson
text: This is my go to company for carpet cleaning! Excellent service!

name: jolene Crabtree
text: Great guys and professional

name: Tinderly Johnson
text: Steve was awesome.  He did an excellent job.  This was the second time he's come out to clean our carpets.  The first time was about 4-5 years ago and he did even better this time.  We chose Chem-Dry again because of Steve's professionalism, punctuality and excellent service.  He did a great job last time and did even better today.

resp.text: Tinderly, we truly appreciate your comments and continuing to use our cleaning service. Steven does work hard and cares about the work he does. Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry.

name: E A
text: Stephan was very detailed and professional in the process

resp.text: Thank you Eric for choosing Huntsville ChemDry to clean your sofa. I hope you had a great holiday weekend. Tara

name: Danielle Dillon
text: Stephan did a great job on our carpets! We will definitely use him again!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Huntsville ChemDry. Have a wonderful holiday weekend. Tara

name: Linda Muzquiz
text: I am so lucky to have found Huntsville Chem-Dry!! From the moment I contacted them using their online contact form, I have been impressed with their responsiveness and ease of scheduling the pick up and return of my carpets. I had two runners and a large round carpet cleaned, I have two beautiful dachshunds so I had them cleaned for possible urine stains, just to be on the safe side… To my delight, they contacted me just 5 days later to let me know my carpets were cleaned and ready to be returned! I was expecting a couple of weeks based on experience with other rug cleaning companies. I will definitely be using their services again and again and highly recommend them!! They were a joy to work with, very sweet and friendly, and I am a very satisfied customer!!

resp.text: Thank you Linda. I know the dogs will be happy to have their rugs back to play on and under!  Speaking with you today made my day. Thank you for your service and congratulations on your upcoming retirement. Cheers to your next adventure!  Tara

name: Taylor Walding
text: We bought a house that previously had 2 dogs and a cat in it, but we don’t have animals because I’m allergic. Hence calling in the professionals to clean before we moved in. What kind of carpet cleaning company doesn’t vacuum first? I paid nearly $500 to have my carpets cleaned and there was pet hair left everywhere afterward. The owner and the local guy were rude to me on multiple occasions. I had to follow up several times to get them to come back and fix it. I was originally quoted $350 which ended up being $450 when he arrived. That’s fine - but then they refused to correct the problem at no charge. I told them that was fine, but I’d be leaving a negative review to warn others. After several back and forths, they finally caved and he agreed to vacuum again. He then refused to vacuum the upstairs (which was about half the job) claiming “it looks fine to me.” He then had the audacity to complain to me about “getting him in trouble” by telling the owner he gave me the sanitizer for free. How was I supposed to know he wasn’t allowed to do that? I figured that was a nice bonus they occasionally threw in free. If he got in trouble, that’s the natural consequence of his voluntary actions - not my fault for mentioning it on the phone while trying to sort things out. Pretty bad experience overall, but the carpets are clean now.

resp.text: Taylor, thank you for your feedback. I am glad that the technician was finally able to get back out there for you. I do apologize for putting you in that awkward situation after you said that he gave you free sanitizer and you left him a tip. I don’t have a problem that he gave you the free sanitizer but that should have been in his notes so I was aware None of that was your fault at all and again I apologize.

name: Tina Close
text: Steven arrived early and was extremely efficient. Great results and would definitely utilize this business again.

resp.text: Tina, thank you for choosing Huntsville ChemDry to clean and sanitize your carpets. We truly enjoy being the healthy home experts for our clients and their pets. Have a great week!  Tara

name: Karen Ogrady
text:
From the minute Stephan came to my home he was professional and so very knowledgeable
I will definitely be calling him back
Such a pleasure

resp.text:
Thank you Karen.  I'm glad we were able to take care of your carpet cleaning so quickly.  Have a wonderful week.
Tara

name: Rhonda Stoner
text:
Tara was welcoming and professional from the moment she answered the phone. I had used Chem Dry in Decatur before they closed the Decatur office. Normally the Huntsvile franchise does not service Decatur, but Tara came up with a solution. We also cleaned the carpet at my husband’s office while they were in our area.

Stephen, the technician was professional and kind, plus he worked hard to ensure he got several stubborn stains out of our carpet.

I highly recommend Huntsville Chem Dry.
The cost was worth every penny I spent.

resp.text:
Thank you Rhonda for your kind words. No one ever mentions me in the reviews just the cleaning that we do so you just made my day!!  Let me know when you’re ready for your tile cleaning. Have an amazing day.
Tara

name: Bryan L Gassaway
text: My wife and I have been using Chem-Dry for many years.  We love how their professionalism, promptness, and value.  Their technicians discussed which stains are be hard to remove at the beginning (to set expectations) and tried their best to remove them.

resp.text: Bryan, thank you for trusting in Huntsville Chem-Dry and choosing our service and we hope to service you again in the future.

name: Robyn Gallagher
text: I will tell you I have used other companies for my carpets and tile and has been awful. Stephen came over and was amazing! Was so kind and explained exactly what he was going to do. Did a perfect job. Won’t use anybody else but Huntsville Chem Dry for sure.

resp.text: Thank you Robyn. We’re so happy you chose Huntsville ChemDry to make your home a clean & healthy environment. Have a great weekend.

name: Paula Smith
text:
I was very pleased with the service provided by Chem-Dry. Tim and Stephen did an awesome job removing and cleaning a polish build up from my tile floors. Thanks, for the prompt, courteous, and professional service. I would highly recommend Chem-Dry.

Paula Smith

resp.text: Very happy we could take care of that for you. Over counter polish is applied all the time to natural wood floor, engineered wood floor and LVT by mistake. It may look good or great for a little while but eventually it will break down or look hazy. Once you start the polish hamster wheel it’s hard to get off. We can safely remove the polish and return your flooring to its natural original condition. You being a realtor I’m sure you may see this in homes and very common, now you know it can be fixed!  Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry!

name: Reginald Snell
text: We were lucky enough to get Steve to perform the service of cleaning and sealing our tile and granite. He was very hard working, professional and personable. Thank you ChemDry!

resp.text: Thank you Reginald. I’m so happy that we were able to seal the tile/ grout and granite countertops for you and Audrey. Have a great day.

name: Sergio Flores
text: I needed my carpet cleaned  and I thought I give them a call and got say they did a great job. Spotless and great service

resp.text: Sergio, thank you for trusting Huntsville Chem-Dry to take care of the spots and spills in your carpet. Always know were here for you anytime.

name: Erin
text: I was very happy with the service provided by ChemDry. Making the appointment was easy. They were straightforward when explaining their services. The technician, Stephan, called me when he was on his way, which minimized my time away from work. He was friendly and thorough when conducting the walk-through and explained exactly what he would be doing. I was very pleased with the results. No complaints.

resp.text:
Thank you so much.  I also really appreciate that you called today to make sure you got the technician's name correct.  I will make sure he sees this.  Have a great evening.

Tara Outson
Owner, Huntsville ChemDry

name: Maria Huck
text: Stephan did a great job on my carpet and sofa. He arrived on time and was courteous and respectful.  Will definitely use again.

resp.text: Hi Maria, we are so pleased you chose to use our cleaning company. For future reference we also clean hardwood floors, area rugs and tile. Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-dry.

name: Glenette Brodzinski
text: I read online about how Chemdry could remove pet odors out of carpets. I read reviews of how great they do. I looked at the ads for discounts and specials. $39. A room, 50% off of pet odor treatment!  Sounded great. I called and explained that I have 4 area rugs that needed pet odor cleaning. That three of them are very inexpensive synthetic rugs and one was a little better grade, wool rug.  She took just a minute to give me a quote. With my 50% off special, it would only be $2600. !!!  WHAT!  I could buy bigger better then I have rugs for that price!!  I have a company that I have used before that picked up and returned, did a great job, for $300. a rug. These rugs are not worth that cost!  Much less over $600 per rug!! AND THATS THE 50% OFF price! God help anyone that needs to clean their rugs when they don’t have a special on!!  No thanks. I can buy new rugs for that price!!!

resp.text:
Glenette, I am sorry that we were not able to help you when you called today for an estimate.  The $2600 was to clean and remove the pet urine odor out of 5 large rugs.  The cleaning of rugs is much different than carpet cleaning and urine removal.  We cannot clean rugs with pet urine in the home as you do not want your hardwood floors to get wet.  In our facility the rugs go through many steps to be cleaned properly (dusting machine, submersion bath, centrifuge, hung in drying room and then any fringe is repaired).  I do understand that our cleaning method is more expensive than what some people pay for synthetic rugs.  As I stated on the phone earlier today, please do not let someone treat the urine issues in our home.  You want to protect your hardwoods.  Enjoy the rest of your weekend.

Tara Outson
Owner, Huntsville Chem-Dry

name: jennifer vinson
text: We were so pleased with the results of our cleaning!  Even though there were several stained areas which required more detailed cleaning, the carpet was dry within a few hours. Would recommend Chem-Dry to anyone.

resp.text: Jennifer, glad you were pleased with the cleaning! We are used to tackling the tough stains, if we can't get them out, no one else can. It was a pleasure working for you and hope to again in the future. Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry for your carpet cleaning needs.

name: Michel Bouvier
text: Our carpet had been cleaned once before using a dry process but the result was less than satisfactory. The Chem-Dry cleaning process proved to be much better then the previous dry process. All the spots that the dry process could not removed were removed and did not return using the Chem-Dry process. Also, the carpet once cleaned had no smell or visible residue and was dry within 2 hours. We are very satisfied and will call on Chem-Dry to clean our carpets in the future.

resp.text: Michel, thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry and just to clarify, our cleaning process is a wet clean but we use a lot less water than many steam cleaning companies and still provide a deep extraction cleaning pulling out the moisture we put into the carpet with our advanced cleaning equipment and amplified extraction. The moisture that does remain dries in about 2 to 3 hours.  And we never leave any kind of soap or residue in your carpet so this cleaning should last a lot longer for you. Once again it was a pleasure meeting you and we hope to be of service to you again in the future. Maybe your upholstery next time! Thank you.

name: Kay Lewis
text: The service I received from Chem-Dry Huntsville was superior. The technician arrived on time, offered me advice on products and services, but was not hard sell. He worked diligently for more than 2 hours and then left without a trace, except for my sparkling clean and fresh carpet. I will definitely use Chem-Dry again.

resp.text: Kay, thank you so much for your kind words.  I will make sure I let Adam know what you said about him.  Have a great day.

name: jennifer vinson
text: We were so pleased with the results of our cleaning!  Even though there were several stained areas which required more detailed cleaning, the carpet was dry within a few hours. Would recommend Chem-Dry to anyone.

resp.text: Jennifer, glad you were pleased with the cleaning! We are used to tackling the tough stains, if we can't get them out, no one else can. It was a pleasure working for you and hope to again in the future. Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry for your carpet cleaning needs.

name: Susan Simons
text:
Overall it was a good job of cleaning my carpet that is fairly new but heavily soiled by my dog.  It smells and looks great and Steve worked very hard to clean thoroughly and comply with requests.  He was also fair about giving me the best price he could.  A couple of things I would say could be improved - Steve was not provided anything by Chem-Dry to put under my heavy sofas to protect the legs since those could not be moved out of the room.  In the past, the company we used had some plastic squares.  Steve used plastic grocery bags from Target that I provided him and one faded the red onto the carpet but it is in an obscure place that is not noticeable.  Also it would seem ideal to have 2 people working the job vs. one because of better control of the long hoses, etc. which dripped some moisture and dirt from someone else's house onto my hardwood foyer.  Not preferred but not a big deal either.  Also, I signed the paperwork at the end without reading the words written, just the price.
Later, my husband read it and asked me why the work was not guaranteed against the stains coming back, etc.  I plan to call and ask them about that.  Hopefully the stains won't come back so a moot point.
I would recommend just the basic cleaning plus any pet stain treatment for rooms that might have pet soiling.  The basic formula is supposedly with baking soda and that is truly all natural.  There were options to buy two add-ons in the cleaning formula - an anti-microbial spray and a scotch-guard product.  I opted out on these 2 and don't think there were beneficial.  In fact have read that scotch-guard can be harmful to health.
Also, if you are expecting this service to have very little moisture after cleaning, not really so.  Even un-pet-treated rooms needed overnight to completely dry to move furniture back and my cleaning started at 11:00 am ish.
Have a great day!

resp.text:
Susan, Thank you for your comments & for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry to serve you.  We always strive for 5-star reviews but we welcome the opportunity to learn & improve from other reviews.  Your input is very valuable.  I want a take a minute or two to clarify a few things.
It is standard that we provide plastic tabs for furniture legs so I am embarrassed to hear that we did not have them on the van that day.  Plastic bags are not acceptable & I apologize for the inconvenience.
We run one man crews on the van to help keep the cleaning costs lower for our customers.
Our paperwork & signature is an agreement confirming our price before the work begins & our agreement that we will do everything we can to remove stains but we cannot guarantee complete stain removal.
We do have 3 packages to choose from, our Basic Cleaning, our Stain Fighter Package & our Healthy Home Package.  Our Chem-Dry proprietary cleaning solution is called The Natural.  It is not like baking soda but it is a Green-Certified cleaning agent.  It is a wonderful product that does not leave a dirt attracting residue and has amazing cleaning abilities while still being safe to drink (tastes awful though)!  Our Stain Fighter package consists of co-applying the stain protectant (another Green-Certified product called PowerGuard) with the cleaning.  Scotchguard is a brand of protectant that is toxic but we pride ourselves on using safe products for the home.  Re-applying stain protectant is very important to extend the look of your carpets.  The original protectant wears off over time with vacuuming and normal activities.  You mentioned that yours is fairly new so it's always good to re-apply once a year on average, this will make cleaning up spills or muddy paws so easy on you in between professional cleanings.  Most companies spray some kind of protectant on the carpet after cleaning which creates a crusty top layer.  Our co-application of the protectant allows us to protect the entire carpet fiber, not just the top.  Our Healthy Home package is the combination of the cleaning, the protectant and an Ant-Microbial pre-spray which removes bacteria in the carpet (especially if there are pets).
Results can vary with drying times in carpet depending on how dirty it is and what kind of carpet it is.  2-3 hours is average but we run our cleaning machine until the carpet is clean without soaking the carpet pad & we use a powerful extraction method for the best possible results.
Again, thank you Susan for your recommendations & please let me know if I can help in any way.

Tara Outson
Owner, Huntsville Chem-Dry

name: Cindy Stewart
text: Chem-Dry made our ten year old carpet look brand new.  I was very impressed by the professionalism and expertise of our technician that cleaned our carpet.  I recommend them to anyone who needs cleaner carpet.  We decided to let them clean our carpet yearly after this great job!

resp.text: Cindy, we thank you so much for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry and recognizing the difference, comparing our cleaning process to other companies. We hope to serve you for years to come!

name: E A
text: Stephan was very detailed and professional in the process

resp.text: Thank you Eric for choosing Huntsville ChemDry to clean your sofa. I hope you had a great holiday weekend. Tara

text:
I am very pleased with the cleaning of my carpet.
The carpet was not wet, all the stains were removed and the carpet was only moist when the job was completed.  Your service person was very professional, knowledgeable and  attentive to the job.  He was late for the appointment due to the fact that he was the only service person and some jobs ahead of my appointment  took him longer than expected.

I recommend the company to have more service persons in my area.

resp.text: Carolyn, Thank you for your comments and input. We do apologize our technician was running late that day but that can happen occasionally. We hope to be of service to you in the future as well and thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry.

text: We were lucky enough to get Steve to perform the service of cleaning and sealing our tile and granite. He was very hard working, professional and personable. Thank you ChemDry!

resp.text: Thank you Reginald. I’m so happy that we were able to seal the tile/ grout and granite countertops for you and Audrey. Have a great day.

name: Jacke James-Raines
text: Excellent job by Chem-Dry!  I requested a quote and service and received both in the same day.  That was totally unexpected and very much appreciated!  Scott did an excellent job on the carpet and helped with an awful odor and fabric stains on a couch skirt.  Overall superb job--BRAVO!

resp.text: Thank you for your business for your upholstery cleaning needs from Huntsville Chem-Dry.

name: Ann Tippie
text: Aaron Johnston arrived on time and did a fantastic job of cleaning my furniture. He was very concerned about a couple of pieces, as to whether the colors would bleed. He moved the chair and sofa in my family room on top of the area rug to clean them. This was to protect my wood floors. Afterward, he cleaned the rug. He was very personable and I believe a great representative for your company.

resp.text: Thank you for recognizing the extra efforts our staff will take to provide a quality home service, from Huntsville Chem-Dry.

name: Linda Underwood
text: Customer service was great and the work and tech was excellent..  I was quoted $200 over original quote and did pay$100.00 over original quote over the phone.  That was for a standard couch ,love seat and chair plus a small lobby type couch..  I can no longer afford the services and I have supported Chem Dry for many many years ..$300.00 is just too much for what I needed done.

resp.text: Linda, we do appreciate your business over the years and I think there maybe some confusion as to what was discussed on the phone and what was added on during the appointment which did increase the price. Cleaning upholstery is something we do very well, and it is detailed and time consuming. We clean some upholstery that other companies turn down and we still get very good results so the pricing for this kind of service is at a premium.

name: Corey Jobman
text: Scott was the man that arrived on time and was very friendly. Everything was explained very well about how the cleaning process worked and makes me wish I would have used them a long time ago. My carpet looks and feels very clean. The carpet took about 3 hours to dry but never really felt too wet anyway. This was a much better service experience from Chem-Dry than what I have used in the past and I will only use them from now on.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting Huntsville Chem-Dry in your home and we hope to serve you again in the future!

name: Plothole
text: Got a new house with a previous cat owner. After a quick call to Chem Dry the next day the house was cleaned and my allergy friend couldn't even tell I cat had ever lived here. They do great work and very fast as well!

resp.text: Allergy relief is our specialty along with pet odor removal. Our deep extraction cleaning process is powerful and very effective compared to the cleaning process from other companies. Thank you!

name: Logan Robinson
text: Great service!  I have my carpet cleaned on a regular basis and am most pleased with Chem-Dry.  Scott was on time, very thorough, and did an excellent job.  I will definitely use them again.

resp.text: Logan, thank you for using our service. It's wonderful to have you as a repeat customer, Thank You!

name: Cindy Stewart
text: Chem-Dry made our ten year old carpet look brand new.  I was very impressed by the professionalism and expertise of our technician that cleaned our carpet.  I recommend them to anyone who needs cleaner carpet.  We decided to let them clean our carpet yearly after this great job!

resp.text: Cindy, we thank you so much for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry and recognizing the difference, comparing our cleaning process to other companies. We hope to serve you for years to come!

name: Janice Mullen
text: Recently had our carpets cleaned by Chem-Dry and they all looked great.  Aaron  was very polite and answered all our questions about the process.  We will definitely use them again if needed.

resp.text: Janice, We thank you for choosing our company Huntsville Chem-Dry, and we hope to be your go to company for years to come. We also clean upholstery, oriental rugs, also tile and grout. You can also expect to receive a 10% automatic repeat customer discount for your next service. Thank You!

name: Steven B.
text:
Steve did a fantastic job of cleaning my carpets of the house I just bought. I called Chem-Dry up at 8:07 am on a Saturday and by 11:30 he was there. I showed him the rooms, he measured, we agreed upon the very reasonable price, and he got to work.

He was done in about 1.5 hours from start to finish and the carpets look great. No residue and the carpets were dry in under 3 hours.

I've used other services in the area to clean my carpets but Chem-Dry did the best job!

10/10 WILL USE THEM AGAIN.

Thank you!

resp.text:
Thank you so much Steven.  Good luck in your new home.

Tara

name: Carmen Hurter
text:
Edit to original post. Since leaving my review ChemDry did contact me and sent someone out to re-clean the areas at no charge. I appreciate the customer service in addressing the review and trying to make us happy with the experience. Thank you!

The service provided was good however we were less than impressed with the results. My husband and I did some of the floors ourselves by hand before we hired ChemDry and those actually turned out better and lighter than having them professionally cleaned. For almost $700 we were hardly able to tell a difference. Most disappointingly, ChemDry contacted me asking me to leave a review. I contacted them back letting them know our issues hoping someone would reach out if they actually cared about my mediocre experience. After waiting 2 weeks I decided to go ahead and post about it here because they never reached out.

resp.text: Carmen,  I did leave a message that very day to see what we could do.  I left it with the number ending in ..43.  I am very sorry, maybe I have the number incorrect in the computer.  I will email you.  Thank you for this feedback.

name: Niki Ward
text: He was really great - nice young man and very professional. My sofa and carpets look brand new!!! I highly recommend Chem-Dry!

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to provide service to you. We send out a reminder card in 6 months as a reminder for your carpet cleaning or upholstery cleaning needs.

name: Tom Lockard
text: Excellent job had house that belonged to my uncle and carpet was in real bad shape Chem Dru got it clean amazing job looks better than I hoped it would ; highly recommend if you need carpet cleaning service

resp.text: Tom, thanks for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry and glad we saved you potentially thousands of dollars from having to replace the carpet.

name: Gina Barlow
text: Steven did a fantastic job.   Not only did he remove the stain out of a chair, he explained the process thoroughly and was very professional, courteous and respectful.

resp.text:
Gina,

Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry. Stephen is our top technician with over 15 years of experience and he does such a great job. He is also experienced in carpet stretching and repairs.

name: Tonya Walls
text: After the cleaning, a nice clean scent engulfed the entire office! Very pleased with the results!

resp.text: Glad we could help your situation, just a note we did apply a deodorizer for the cleaning, normally our cleaning process is odorless. But all of our products are Eco friendly as well.

name: Debbie Price
text: Great customer service, very knowledgeable and I'm very pleased.  I will be using Chem-Dry again the next time I need it.  Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you Debbie for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry. It was nice meeting you and we will see you next time.

name: Shirley Sampayo
text: Excellent work done by the tech. He was respectful and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Huntsville Chem-Dry!

name: Melissa Smith
text: I tried to get a quote from Chem-Dry recently that left me with a negative impression of the company. I'm not quite sure what went wrong, but the owner, who answered the phone, was brusque and acted as if I was wasting her time... although I spent less than 3 minutes talking to her and only inquired about 2 things. I have a medical condition that makes it hard to speak quickly or process the speech of others, maybe that's where we got off on the wrong foot. Anyway, I tried to ask about the price for one room and a couple of other spots throughout the house. I was confused when she told me the price would be $135, as the website says a living room is $55. I asked her about it, and she told me the minimum is $135. That would have been fine (even though other companies I've called either do not have a minimum or have a smaller minimum), but the attitude behind the comment was if she was talking to a clueless employee rather than a potential customer. Wouldn't you get more customers if you spoke pleasantly and said something like, "I'm sorry about that. Although we'd like to serve as many clients as possible, because of our high quality service, our overhead to come out for less than the price of 3 rooms wouldn't allow us to stay open for business." rather than "No. There's a $135 minimum." in a rather snotty and abrupt tone? Because I had wondered why they weren't listed with the BBB, I asked if they were considering registering with them. I actually wasn't planning on asking about that, but I needed a minute to think after the first part of the conversation went so poorly. Things only got worse. In the same 'you're an idiot, leave me alone' tone, she said "All that means is that you paid them a yearly fee." So after this friendly and pleasant interaction, I told her thank you anyway and hung up. I'd work on my customer interactions if I were this business owner. Who knows, maybe she was having an off-morning, or maybe my voice reminded her of someone she didn't like. Hopefully that's the case and you'll have a more agreeable and satisfying experience than I did.

resp.text:
Melissa,

Thank you for bringing this to my attention.  I really had no idea how I was coming across on our phone call.  I am deeply sorry for that.  Our website does show that if you are getting a living room cleaned that the price for that room is $55.  Underneath that it also shows that our minimum charge is $119.  I will take your suggests to heart and thank you again for letting me know.  I don't ever want anyone feeling that way again.  Have a great weekend.

Tara Outson
Owner, Huntsville ChemDry

ANNE AND STEVE, THE OWNERS ARE NICE, CARING AND CHARGE REASONABLE PRICES.

MY WEEK STARTED OFF HORRIBLE WHEN AN HVAC COMPANY NAMED AUTUMN AIR CAME IN TO REPLACE MY HOT WATER HEATER AND ENDED UP LEAVING ME WITH A HALF FLOODED  KITCHEN FLOOR WHICH PARTIALLY WET MY DEN CARPET.
THERE WAS NO OFFER TO HELP CLEAN UP THE WATER.

I CALLED SAFE DRY FIRST TO CLEAN CARPET. THE NICE GIRL I SPOKE WITH ON THE PHONE QUOTED ME $59 BUT WARNED IT MIGHT GO UP A LITTLE WHEN T H E CLEANER ARRIVED. I HAVE A SMALL DEN IN.MY TOWNHOUSE . HE SAID HE WOULD BE NICE AND ONLY CHARGE 300.00!!!!! I ASKED HIM TO LEAVE. APPARENTLY THEYVE DONE THIS TO OTHERS. SO, WHEN I CALLED ANNE OWNER OF HEAVENS  BEST SHE QUOTED A VERY REASONABLE PRICE AND WAS SO NICE.

I HIGHLY RECCOMMEND THEM TO CLEAN YOUR CARPET AND DILLON AND BROCK DID A GREAT JOB.
THANKS SOOOOO MUCH!

resp.text: Hi Miss Allgood, Thank you so much for allowing our technicians to come into your home and clean. We are so happy that we were able to help clean up from the flooding of your kitchen. We are glad you called us to come out and help. We try to make the cleaning process easy and affordable and we do not practice "bait and switch" tactics that some other carpet cleaners do. We try to do a good job at an affordable price. We are so glad to hear that we helped improve your week and make your carpets look better. We appreciate your business and your 5 Star recommendation. Thank you so much! Ann & Steve

name: ira bornstein
text:
Very good experience from the staff - The carpets are cleaner, and the price was fair. The business' website offered good information, and an easy capability to schedule an appointment.
There was some confusion on arrival as there was an auto-generated "on the way" text sent about three hours prior to the actual arrival which caused some frustration, but that appeared to be an isolated incident.
The technicians also conveyed the value of adding a Scotchgard treatment only to tell me that they didn't have the Scotchgard with them, and then later saying that they found it...I anticipate it may be of value.in the future.
Overall, I'd likely contact them again in the future for carpet cleaning needs.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Bornstein, Thanks so much for reviewing us and explaining your experience. Unfortunately, the Coronavirus situation has affected our busines. We have a couple of our regular technicians out quaratining. We are trying to continue servicing all our appointments with a reduced staff and with new employees. One of our new employees accidentally hit the "on the way" button for your job instead of the job he was supposed to contact and we were unaware this happened. Once we realized this happened, I called you to let you know we had made a mistake. We are not perfect, but we definitley try to fix it if we make a mistake. And, we apologize that our technicians couldn't find the Scotchgard. It was on the van, but they are not familiar with where everything is on the van and couldn't find it. We are sorry for these problems, but thank you for the review and we hope to clean for you again. Sincerely, Ann & Steve Mobley - Owners

name: Jim Parks
text:
I scheduled an appointment with a dry carpet cleaner – arrived in the last seven (7) minutes of the arrival window.  Set-up, started working (note – I did not say cleaning), and after many minutes, the two and a half rooms completed were soaked, and the dirty areas were still dirty.  After washing the spot with brush and cleaner, seeing the difference, I asked him to leave.

Called Heaven’s Best Carpet and Rug Cleaners.  I had “prepped” the whole house for carpet cleaning (furniture up, lighting on, total vacuuming with specific edge cleaning).  That same day, Heaven’s Best came, cleaned our bedroom carpet so we had a place to sleep, returned the next day and completed the entire job.  Two (2) spots did not come completely out, but their cleaning process made a big difference in the carpet’s appearance.  And the two (2) flights of stairs were spectacular.

Use my learning curve; get the right company the first time; save yourself time, money and frustration.

name: Gaines McMillan
text:
A cat decided to use the restroom on my couch a while back, and the odor would not go away despite a few cleanings with an upholstery cleaner. Steve and a technician arrived exactly when they said they would and quickly diagnosed that cleaning the couch would make the problem worse. I appreciated their honesty instead simply cleaning the couch and leaving. You hope that most companies would do the same, but you never know.

Update 8/25/16:
I used several pet deodorizers on my couch, which made it smell better, but the couch was still stained and smelled a little bit still. As a last resort before giving it away, I decided to Heaven's Best again. They arrived early (better for me), and Steve and his two technicians were just as nice as the first time. I had them clean my couch and chair ($129 special), and they did an incredible job. The couch was pretty badly stained from the various deodorizers I used, but they were able to remove them all. I highly recommend Steve and his team at Heaven's Best and will definitely use them again when needed!

resp.text: Hi Mr. McMillan, Thanks so much for leaving a review for us!  We love to clean for our customers, but sometimes we just can't.  Pet Stains are some of the hardest to get out of upholstery and carpets.  They can be cleaned, but sometimes it is just not worth it if they stains are deep in the upholstery or in the padding of the carpets.  We try to be as honest as we can with our customers, so they can make decisions that will not break their budget.  And, we try to live up to our name "Heaven's Best" every day. text: I've worked with many contractors and trades during my 30 years as a rental property owner. I recently hired Heaven's Best to restore the floors in one of my properties. I thought for sure there was no way they would be restored to the condition where I could sell this home without replacing all the flooring. text: The lady who answers the phone sounds like she just woke up from a nap...9am, 1pm, 4pm....it doesn’t matter.

resp.text: Hi Shan K, Thanks so much for giving Heaven's Best Carpet Cleaning a 5 Star Review!  We pride ourselves in doing exceptional work for all our customers. I own Heaven's Best Carpet & Rug Cleaners with my husband Stephen Mobley and I do answer the phone most of the time. My name is Ann Mobley and I help my husband Steve run our business. He is out in the field all day and I am in the Office all day. We work extremely hard every day to make the cleaning process easy on our customers. I am on the phone from 7:30am until about 8pm everyday managing our business, and unfortunately I have very bad allergies at this time of year. If it sounds like I just woke up, I apologize. I can promise you I did not just wake up. I run all aspects of our business and I work extremely hard to make sure all of our customers get personal attention. That is why I try to Never Miss a Call. I go from Call to Call to Call, in order to make sure I don't miss anyone. I have very bad allergies and my throat has been extremely sore for the past month.  I am just thankful that I do not have the Coronavirus and that I am able to help our customers get their homes and offices cleaned and disinfected so they, their workers and their families can feel safe. I can promise you I did not just wake up from a nap and that I am doing everything I can to make sure all our customers needs are taken care of.  We appreciate the opportunity to provide our cleaning services for you and all our happy customers.

Please keep in mind that the same person cleaned my dryer vent duct twice before.

name: Vega Foster
text: I'm very satisfied with the duct cleaning done by Paragon. My house sat empty for six years and after moving in, the air was thick and dusty and I would wake up congested. After Paragon cleaned my air ducts, the quality of air in my home is noticeably improved and I wake up feeling great. The job they did was worth every single penny. Thank you so much!

name: April Copeland
text: Always friendly and helpful. Great prices on supplies

name: Felicia Thomas
text: I highly recommend paragon industries for all your cleaning supply needs super kind and very helpful go out of their way to make sure you get the right products for the job !

name: Hayden Hill
text: Good group of gentlemen

name: Michael Cannon
text: Knowledgeable. Friendly. Great selection of products

name: Sean J
text:
Scammers. They did not perform the services they said they were going to. They completely ignored the proper protocol for mold removal and had to be let go mid service. They piled mold contaminated items on top of non contaminated items. They did not seal off contaminated rooms from other areas.
They took advantage of my elderly in-laws.
Would give no stars if possible.

In response to your response. The proper protocol plan that you told my wife you were going to follow was not followed. You set bags of contaminated items on our personal items in a separate room. You stacked contaminated bags against the face of a flatscreen tv. There were pieces of contaminated sheetrock all over the floor in a room that you claimed was clean. Yes, I was upset because of all of this.
As my wife explained to you in the beginning,  she is highly allergic to mold. So, when I saw contaminated items drug through our living room and placed on our non contaminated things, it upset me. I even took pictures of it. I'm sorry your feelings got hurt, but you ruined our things and wasted our time.

We have now discovered that more things were ruined in the bags they carelessly packed. A bottle of shampoo was thrown into a bag where it broke open and poured onto my daughter's $300 camera, the bible she received from us at her Baptism, and many other valuables. That was just one bag. The amount of loss from this company is beyond a money value. Personal, irreplaceable  items were destroyed also.

In response to what you responded to my wife and her comments. All I can say is that you're shameless. We know the difference between  what you said that you would do and what was done...two completely different things. Again, to anyone who reads this...no stars.

resp.text: Sean, Your review is not true or accurate.  Our company followed appropriate protocol which included erecting containment barriers.  There was NO cross-contamination, as you stated.  Our company has been in business since 1979 and we are highly reputable.  All was running smoothly until you entered the picture. What you failed to mention was your erratic behavior towards our crew.  You verbally assaulted our crew and even continued yelling after our crew had exited the house.  You displayed a total lack of self control.  We did not create the mold issues in this house but we are well qualified to remediate any mold problem.  It appears that your personal problems boiled over and you chose to take it out on our crew.  That was a cowardly move.  For clarification- While your in-laws are senior citizens, your description of them as "elderly" invokes an image of feebleness.  Your in-laws appear to be spry, able bodied and mentally fit.  Furthermore, your assertion that we were taking advantage of your in-laws may well be a projection since you - a grown man, are living in your in-laws basement. Your behavior and attempts to discredit our company are/were immature and reprehensible!

name: Paige Janke
text:
LIARS, SCAMMERS & THIEVES!!!!

This review is in addition to the one my husband, Sean, left last week. I met with Rick and his wife at the beginning of August for them to run air sample tests on my parents house. They ran the test in 4 rooms, and called me 2 days later with the results.  When Rick called me he said that the levels of Stachybotrys were among some of the highest indoor levels he had seen in his 15 years of experience. In addition to the phone call I received an email from him with the results and a message stating that it was very dangerous for anyone to enter that area without protective gear on. He also insisted that we allow them to come back out and test 2 more rooms in the same area. He and his wife came back the next day, August 11th or 12th, to run the other 2 tests. WE STILL HAVE NOT RECEIVED THE RESULTS FROM THOSE TESTS THAT WE PAID FOR 2 MONTHS AGO. We have asked for the results multiple times and the only answer my Dad got was that the tests came back ok.

Before Paragon Industrial was hired to do the mold remediation, I spoke with Rick and his wife about their protocol for removing contaminated items as to not cross contaminate the other rooms and items. After talking with them at length about how they would do the job, I felt comfortable with the protocol and encouraged my 80 year old father to go with their company.

They told my parents that they needed to run the air scrubbers upstairs and clean the air ducts first. Why would you clean upstairs before you remediate the toxic black mold downstairs? That doesn't even make sense. The mold should have been remediated first, then the air ducts, and last the air scrubbers.

When they came to start the remediation THEY DID NOT FOLLOW ANY OF THE PROTOCOLS THAT THEY HAD EXPLAINED TO ME IN DETAIL BEFORE BEING HIRED! As far as erecting containment barriers, they put up some plastic sheeting with duck tape that began peeling off of the walls and door the same day they were put up. The air conditioning vents were not sealed off and the unit was not shut off while they were ripping moldy Sheetrock down. Also, they threw everything into black garbage bags from the contaminated room and threw it on top of our furniture in the living room causing CROSS CONTAMINATION. There was also moldy Sheetrock strewn down the hall where they drug it out! They explained to me that the Sheetrock would be taken down in small pieces, bagged and sealed before being removed completely from the house.

My ELDERLY father called to tell us what was going on at the house and I told my husband to go make sure things were being done like they said they were going to do them. When my husband, Sean, got to the house he found a huge mess! EVERYTHING HAD BEEN CROSS CONTAMINATED! My husband was in shock at how careless they were being because he was concerned about the impact it would have on my health! We had recently found out that I have lesions on my spine, unusual rashes, peripheral neuropathy, daily debilitating migraines, and chronic sinus infections ALL caused by exposure to black mold. My husband had to leave me alone in bed after being released from the hospital to come over to the house to find out what was going on. That is the reason he reacted the way he did, because he is genuinely concerned about the health of his wife! Any man who saw someone doing something that would bring harm to his family would react the same way!

My father called Rick and released him from the job the next day. He was supposed to return some of the money that my dad had paid upfront, but of course that has not been returned. My parents paid out almost $4000 for them to make a grand mess out of everything!

Since then my parents have had a professional air conditioning company come check the air ducts upstairs that were supposed to be cleaned for $900 and he showed them that they had only been wiped out a couple feet. He inquired about what was paid, and couldn't believe that they paid for the service!!!

I would keep going if google would allow me more characters.

resp.text:
Like your husband, your recollection of events is inaccurate.
The work upstairs was a completely different Indoor Air Quality Issue.  The work upstairs was not mold related.  Because your parents were living in this area, it was the priority.
The work downstairs was performed using industry protocol.
I would like to remind you that we did not cause your mold problem and we did not cause your illness and health problems.
Please stop making false accusations against our company. I wish you the best with your family and your health.

name: Gary Willford
text:
This company is horrible, unresponsive, and they have absolutely zero integrity.  I set up an appointment approximately 1.5 weeks in advance of my refi appraisal so I could have my carpets good and clean when the appraiser came.  The appraisal was to take place on Tuesday, and I had the appointment set up for Monday between 12p and 3p (see photo).  On the Saturday before, I received a voice mail from “Katie” that you see in the photo (I should have trusted Siri when she translated SteamKing as “stinking”).  You can read what she said, but the long and short of it was that she had a scheduling problem and wanted to come early.  I called back, and didn’t get them, but left a voicemail saying that was fine.

We were ready at 9.  When they didn’t show up at 12:30, I called and left another voicemail that was not returned.  At 4:00 I called and finally spoke to Katie.  She said I wasn’t on their schedule!  I told her I needed my carpets cleaned and why and that she had called me Saturday.  She put me on hold, then said that there was a glitch in the system because I scheduled online, and somehow my order was cancelled.  When I reminded her that she called Saturday, she put me on hold again.  This time when she came back she said their tech had called MY CELL PHONE on Saturday and a woman answered.  This woman said the carpets were already cleaned, and she cancelled my appointment.

It is my cell phone.  No one answers it but me.  More importantly, and I can prove this if I need to, my call log shows only the one incoming call from them on Saturday that you see in the photo.

If they will lie about something like this, you cannot trust them to do anything for you.  Avoid them at all costs.

name: Trequilla Bennett
text: They were prompt and very nice but didn't do a good job. The floor was extremely wet after they had to get water out of my bathroom for the job and it left a foul smell. Not to mention I paid extra for a deodorizer. I think he could have been better if they had a bigger machine because this one was small.

name: Kathleen Harrell
text: I honestly think this company should be sued. They quoted me $99 dollars over the phone to clean my couches. Note I gave the measurements of my couch. Then came to my house gave me an outrageous price. I told them I didn't want the service if it was not going to be the quoted price. They proceeded to clean my couches anyway. I had no choice but to pay them. They pulled the old bait switch tactics.  I will never ever recommend them. I can't believe how much money I wasted. The job was not satisfactory.  My couches are still dirty and stink. They also left the couches soaking wet. Which left a mess behind for me to clean up. When I called to speak with someone regarding the manner I was ignored. The customer wasn't always right. I was told what the technician quotes is the right price. Maybe lead with that. Please don't waste your time or money. Beyond angry that I basically threw money away. Now to find a different company to come re-do there hack job.

name: Galynese Williams
text: I scheduled an appointment due to me receiving a coupon. I provided my schedule information and the representative stated they’d come in time enough for me to get to work. Well they arrived 3 hours later after “double booking”. The agent constantly stated that he could only “get this partially” cleaned. I asked about the temperature in which he explained he’d need my water. The quote from the coupon went from $59 to $140, in which, he stated was a discount. 3 rooms had brand new carpets and two were older carpets. I politely stated I didn’t and sent him on his way. If O could rate this a zero I would.

name: Lee Lee HARRISON
text: I was told before paying that my furniture could be restored to almost new. To say the least pictures they post on their testimonials are more than a stretch from the truth. I'm kinda embarrassed to say I paid a little over $360 to have 3 pieces of furniture to look almost exactly like it did before it was "professionally cleaned." I fell for the it will look better as it dries line. However, someone is supposed to be coming out tomorrow "to look" at their finished work. Basically doesn't sound like much will be done to rectify the situation. I normally check reviews beforehand. A mistake I'll never make again. Furthermore, they don't tend to be customer friendly after you've made the payment despite their "guarantees" of quality and rectifying the situation if notified in time. I never would have paid that much money had they been upfront about what they could accomplish. Or in this case not accomplish. You literally could use the money they charge, buy your own steamer and get the same quality of works.

name: Ciara Anderson
text: Very great guys. Did my couch and chairs. I had to get pet odor out and it was a great thing.  Been trying myself and couldn't do it. They came in very quickly, professionally, and got my living room set looking and smelling right. I appreciate their services very much. Would recommend.

name: Paige Mitchell
text: Call to schedule an appointment and was very pleased with  the young lady that assisted me. I explained that I would be at work and she gave an appointment range between 9-12 and ensured me that he would give me a 20 minute call before he would arrive. He ( The Boss as he said) called at 9:30AM saying he was headed there. I left my job which is 7.8 mi from my house less than a 15 minute drive. He called back at 9:47AM saying that he was leaving because I had not answered the door when he arrived. I informed him that I was pulling up , He said he had left and was headed to his next job , He couldn't wait any longer. He was very rude and condescending. I only went with them because of an ad the came in the mail . I would not recommend doing business with them . They do not care about their potential customer or  conducting a business that excels in customer service.

name: Merrill Carter
text:
Absolutely the best! I have tried several area companies in the past but have been with Steam King for years because of their consistent performance. Punctual, professional and very reasonably priced carpet
cleaning.

resp.text:
Thank you for your services!

Have a great day!

name: Markous Sudduth
text: James and his guys did a great job. Carpet looks amazing.  Thanks again

resp.text:
Thank you for your services!

Have a great day!

name: Shelia Walker
text: Just had STEAM KING AT MY house PLEASE DON'T LET THEM CLEAN YOUR CARPET,  they charged me 69.00 for a HALLWAY and Master bedroom, PET deodorizer, and for Grey spots on BROWN CARPET. The Technician was nice, but the coupon are a RIP OFF.  YOU CAN GET THE RUG DOCTOR FOR WHAT THEY DO.

resp.text:
Good Afternoon Shelia!
When you call to schedule a appointment we inform you that if you have any heavily soiled areas the carpet may need to be pretreated. The technician will examine your carpet and determine it's needs. While he is there he will also talk with you about the different types of proctectants and deoderizers we have to offer. Everything is gone over with you before anything is started, and the machine we use is better quality than renting a rug doctor.

Thank you for your business today.

name: Patricia Phelps
text: I have been using Steam King for years for my carpet & pet odor. Have always been very pleased. Bought a new house and recently was referred to them for concrete cleaning for my sun room - we had tried everything to clean - they came in and stayed 15 minutes and it was amazing! Compared to other companies, I have always been satisfied with their service and their price!

name: Justin Jeffries
text: Had a 9am appointment with Steam King and they were promptly there at 9am. They did a deep clean on my carpet and it looked immaculate. I have my carpet cleaned regularly and no one has ever been able to clean it like Steam King does.

name: Terrill Patton
text: They did an excellent job cleaning a carpet. Pricing was more than discussed

name: Jae Nix
text: Got a quote on the phone for $175 for a basic clean. I have a 2 bedroom trailer, plus the living room. It’s a pretty small house. The guys got here and seemed like they knew what they were doing. When they finished, they claimed they added some kind of protectant to the carpet, which I didn’t ask for, nor did they ask me if I wanted. They also claimed they had to use some special cleaner for pet messes. They still didn’t ask, nor did I request them do this. I was at home while they were there and they barely spoke to me so I know I didn’t request or agree to them doing this. They spent maybe 20 minutes per room. The only thing noticeably different with my carpet was the pet hair removed. When they were getting the payment from me, I was told because of all these special treatments they needed to do on my carpet it would be $350! Be cautious with these guys. They really seem fishy. I didn’t read the reviews before booking an appointment, just got a flyer in the mail from them. I wouldn’t recommend these guys to anyone.

name: Charlotte Crump
text: This company came to my friends house.and cleaned 4 rooms highly recommended

resp.text:
Thank you for your services!

Have a great afternoon!

name: Kristen Sutton
text: I have used Steam King the past few times I had my carpets/ couches cleaned and I will continue to use them!  Scheduling is easy and quick, and they were always there within appointment time, very polite and my carpets/ couches look great after they leave. The stain remover, which was explained to me as extra from the coupon price,  is worth it! I read other reviews about people wanting just the steam cleaning, but why else would you get your carpets cleaned if you don’t want the stains gone? I gave them a shot and was not disappointed! Thank you for your great customer service, which is hard to find these days. I look forward to scheduling my next appointment!

name: Julianne Hansen
text: They will do a good job IF you buy all the add-ons.  If you don't, you get very poor service.  The guys just left after I received the "free lifetime" cleaning and I could have done a better job with a store-rented machine, they had to fill up in my sink, and didn't even move a small floor decoration in the corner!  This was just a one room cleaning!  I will NOT be calling them again!  That "free" cleaning still cost me $43 so he could re-apply the Teflon coating that was supposed to protect my carpet from traffic and stains!  Honestly, the traffic areas (that they perfectly cleaned last year) looked horrible (so what's up with the Teflon?)!  Technician's excuse when pressed - "those are your heavy traffic areas and will never look new again."  Really?  I don't like excuses, I want results. Last year, with the big purchase, I got results.   Won't be calling these people back.

resp.text:
Good afternoon Mrs. Hansen,

As the technician explained there were traffic lanes in the carpet. Sorry you feel that way, and thanks again for your services today.

Steam King

name: Stacey Whitaker
text: We are military and scheduled a carpet clean for a new house we bought before we got to town. I was disappointed when I arrived at the house and saw a 1 inch line of dog hair around the master bedroom walls. I called the company 3 times within the first week after services to never receive a call back. I was very disappointed not only in the services rendered but in the customer service afterwards. I would not recommend them to another family and will not be using them again.

name: Zack Warren
text: Fair pricing and good service. Knew mu carpet would require extra services to come clean. Technicians were courteous and professional.

name: avery morrison
text: I purchased the Teflon warranty about three years ago and now my carpet stays cleaner and every time I want it clean Steam king will clean it for free. I pay for the Teflon reapplication and that’s it. Great results and it saves me money. Thanks Steam King.

resp.text: Thanks Avery for being a loyal customer, we appreciate your business.

name: Kory Marshall
text: Great guys, great service. Very pleased with every aspect of the service performed, will definitely use them again

name: Melanie Hyte
text: We used this company because of the good coupon prices. However, they are deceiving and it ended up costing more than the others that I priced. They did a good job cleaning but don't choose them for the coupons. There are hidden costs.

name: Billie Wynn
text: Very nice, on time, and my carpet looks great!

resp.text: Thank you for your services! We appreciate you.

name: Logan Roberson
text: Timothy did an awesome job cleaning our carpet this morning!

resp.text: Thank you for your services today!

name: Dawn hardy
text: Very professional and informative. My carpet came back to life before my eyes. Thanks Steam King.

name: Mark Baran
text: Bait and switch pricing.  The $45.99 coupon for five rooms is just for steam cleaning, then they'll add to it $0.28 a sq/ft pretreatment so our total would have been $139.00.  I told them I didn't want any pretreatment just the steam cleaning.  They refused to just steam clean the carpets.  I refused their services. The worst part is they show up in a little pickup truck with a portable machine.  We decided to pay a reputable company $135 that uses a truck mounted machine.  Steer away from this business.

name: Benita Edwards
text: I was very disappointed to find out that I was not only lured in by the advertised offer (5 area special for $45.95 or whole house for $69.95) but was made to pay an additional amount for a supposedly "pretreatment". I ended up getting THREE small walkway areas in my bedrooms cleaned for $103. I should have simply refused the service -- BIG lesson learned. Beware!!

name: Corey Grooms
text: Glad I called in advance because the coupons and the prices were already a problem !!! They were like they would have to take a look and give me an estimate even after I told them I only wanted the basic services that would match the coupons they mailed out.

name: Heather K.
text: We hired this company because the price was low. Once the work was done (and not very well) the price doubled and nearly tripled magically! Don’t trust them!

name: Jessica Cotton
text: I scheduled for the 5 room + área rug for 45.95....whn they got here he tried to charge me $150 after i refused he said $112 was the minimum. I feel scammed.

name: Kenny Hollinhead
text: Was quoted around 40 dollars over the phone and when they were done charged my wife almost 70. Carpets were clean to start with so I will never use them again. Will not take their own coupons.

name: Amanda Meeks
text:
When I contacted the company to request services; I was told $19.99 and an additional $17.99 for pet odor...    The guys were able to come the next day...   They LITERRALY were at my house for 10 minutes; no  exaggeration Before the "deep cleaning" process began, we were charged $120.00.   So, I thought ok, this is worse than we realized; thinking additional deep cleaning services were going to be done.    2 hours after they left, the smell is back... My husband bought baking soda and poured in on the carpet... 20 minutes later the baking soda is a dark brown/yellowish color...    The space that they "deep clean and deorderized" was 6 feet by 4 feet.  Seriously, a grown person could not sleep in the area.. Very small area... (We bought our house 6 months ago and my small inside dog had a few mistakes..the urine smelt like cat urine, from a previous owner)

My husband bought white  vinegar and used our steam cleaner for 2 hours last night and the smell is gone. The dirt, stains and odor are gone.   The color of the water my husband sucked up, was brown, the smell was unbearable, so what exactly did this company due in the wopping 10 minutes they were here????      We were sucked out of 120.00 and they did absolutely nothing!!!!

name: Tamonica Roberson
text: Timothy did an awesome job!!

resp.text: Thank you for your services today!

text: I used this company due to coupons. Prior to service, I was quoted almost $300. Carpets took 10 hours to dry and were not cleaned.

Very unprofessional
Got coupons in mail coupons said $69 whole house people got there there was a extra charge that was mandatory which was and extra $80 then we ask them how much two rugs were to do an extra $160
My wife called the office not o my was the lady in the office very rude she hung up on my wife ....Very misleading will never use steam king again .....

Hey Brittany Terry,

Steam King

text: this was a top notch experience. I was so impressed about how easy and seamless this process was. text: Paul was great to work with! Really knows his stuff. The instal only took a little over an hour and they were super friendly and efficient! We are so happy with our new carpet. Highly recommend!

name: Lora Gaxiola
text: Paul was responsive and easy to work with. He presented several options to fit our budget. The work was done promptly, neatly, and efficiently and we're so happy with the results!

name: Sarah LeCroy
text: So happy with my floors. I chose to go with a darker grey flooring that is scratch proof and waterproof. I have a black lab, so these floors will be so much better than the dingy carpet I had. Paul was very prompt and even came to my condo to show me samples. I never even had to go in the store, everyone came to me! I called Homewood carpet and flooring, and the same afternoon I ordered my floors. Buk and his helpers were on time and did a fantastic job. They cleaned up very well after laying the floors and were respectful of my furniture and belongings. I live in a 750~ sq ft. Condo, approximately 3/4 of the condo flooring was being redone, and took 10 hours from start to finish. I would highly recommend Homewood Carpet and Flooring. You can’t beat the quality of floors, the timeliness and the accountability they give you for their price. Thank you!

name: Elizabeth Adams
text: Very responsive and helpful! Helped us out in a pinch when our first carpet installer backed out just a few weeks before the project date. Directed me to a carpet that was in stock (and what I wanted) so that the project could move forward on the timeline our business needed. At the install, they discovered an unexpected floor issue which required us to make a last minute change and he handled that and found an available carpet for us. Went above and beyond to make sure our timeline was met! Super nice guys did the install. Great attitudes and a pleasure to work with.

name: Naomi Smitherman
text:
I was pleased with the whole process.  I needed carpet stretched.  I got a fair quote for the work and it was completed sooner than expected.
The two men who stretched the carpet were prompt, courteous, quick workers and they did a great job.  My floors look so much better.

name: Melanie Clark
text: Foo did an amazing job with helping me pick out quality flooring for two basement rooms. He gave a great price and was quick with getting me scheduled. The communication was great through the whole process. He was easy to work with. His team was efficient and very pleasant to deal with. I would definitely recommend!

name: Cody Hirsberg
text: We decided to use Homewood Carpet & Flooring based on the referral of a trusted builder. Tyler was excellent to work with regarding sales and selection. He came by the house for measurements and then met us at the showroom to review his recommendations and to make a flooring selection. Foo then organized the install and, because we were in a bind with guests arriving in a few days, was able to install the carpet a day sooner than expected.  Overall, Homewood Carpet and Flooring exceeded expectations which is why they earned this 5-star review.

name: Ann Langley
text: Paul was extremely helpful and responsive throughout our decision making and installation process.   The installation crew was courteous and very hardworking.  Everything was cleaned up and put back in place when they finished.  I have already referred this company to several friends!

name: Alexandra Baugh
text: Got carpet replaced in 3 rooms. Very fast and good quality work! Would definitely use again and recommend. Fair pricing and kind staff.

name: Wendy Morell
text: I’ve had three jobs done in the last month: carpeting stairs, refinishing original hardwood floors, and laying vinyl flooring. All three looked amazing when finished. The people who completed the work were kind and knowledgeable. I would highly HIGHLY recommend to anyone for any job, and if I have any flooring needs in the future, I will definitely be going back to Foo!

name: Austin Wilson
text: Amazing customer service! Fair pricing, they did a great job, and in a timely manner. Will use again!

name: Shannon George
text: I called on Saturday and was told someone would come out Monday to look at our floors. No one showed up, no one called to cancel, no one called to reschedule.

name: Erika Olds
text: Paul was very nice an easy to work with excellent customer service.This company has great pricing and did an excellent job on my mom's floors. They went above and beyond to make sure she was satisfied I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Mandy Willig
text: Paul and his team replaced our carpet with beautiful engineered hardwood flooring. They provided amazing service throughout the process, from home consultation through the final walk through. We will not hesitate to recommend them to our friends and family!

name: Mark Grissom
text: We had an urgent need entering into a new home. Foo and crew responded same day, made selections easy, had it installed before we could get through the quoting process of big box. The installers were friendly, efficient, and the work was superb with exactly the product we wanted. What else can I say! Oh, above all else wife loves the new carpet and quality work.

name: carol harris
text: From the moment I walked in the door I was completely impressed with Homewood Carpet & Flooring. Not only was Paul knowledgeable about the flooring, he was genuinely interested in my specific needs for flooring. He was completely helpful  in the product selection that would best suit my needs. He stayed in communication with me throughout the entire process. His install team was  right on time and did a beautiful job. The guys were extremely thorough. I was really impressed with their attention to detail. They finished my (whole house) flooring job on time and left my home clean and in order. I have no reservations at all in recommending the guys at Homewood Carpet & Flooring to my friends and family.

name: 9 Bachelors
text: Great job all the way. Excellent service, accurate quotes, very professional, polite and thorough installation team.

name: Greg Yemm
text: Quality, prices, and service were all 5 stars. The owner was very responsive any time I had questions too. Definitely would recommend.

name: Kelly Arrington
text: Enthusiastic crew who did a fantastic job on matching the rest of my floors and amazing job on my stairwell. The were timely, efficient and did a high quality job!

name: Brian Murphy
text: You are in good hands with Paul and his team.  First class service and a job well done.  I would recommend this company to anyone looking for flooring work.  Paul’s team sanded and re-stained my floors.  The work was of the highest quality.  Will definitely work with them again in the future.

name: Corie Clark
text: Foo was easy to work with and very responsive. The carpet and vinyl plank in out basement looks great.

name: Bryan Stack
text:
I highly recommend them. Paul helped me select the flooring to replace my carpet. He was very prompt in providing an estimate and getting the job started.
The installers did an excellent job removing the carpeting and installing my vinyl floors. My condo looks 100% better. I will choose them again when I sell my condo and purchase another home.

name: Britney Henry
text: Paul and his staff did a wonderful job with our flooring project! We had our red oak floors refinished and also had our stairs repaired. They took our very outdated and yellowed flooring and transformed it into a beautiful brown/gray color that is exactly what we had envisioned. They even mixed two of the stains to get the exact color we described. One room had several areas of stains that was so bad I wasn’t sure they would ever look normal, but they were able to make the stains completely disappear. They also replaced a broken part of one step and repaired the stair treads so that they no longer squeak! We are completely satisfied with the job that Homewood Carpet and Flooring did for us and we appreciate their professionalism and thoroughness.

name: felicity79
text: I was unsure of what flooring I wanted, Paul was very helpful on helping me decide to refinish my hardwoods or to choose a new floor. He came to my house to show me color swatches and was willing to come back a second time when I thought I had changed my mind. I ended up going to his store and we picked out a beautiful floor that I am so proud of. Installation only took maybe 4 hours for my 900 ft. square floor. I would choose them again for my flooring needs. Will be redoing my kitchen floor soon, and definitely plan on calling Homewood Carpet and Flooring.

name: Susan Copeland
text: I have used Homewood carpet and flooring three separate times now for my home renovations and each time they exceed my expectations. Both Foo and Paul are really lovely to work with and provide clear communication so that I always knew exactly what was going to occur. And with a German Shepard puppy and 3 teenage boys, they have always guided me on the best flooring and carpet that would keep up with our chaotic and busy household :)!

name: Tracy Thomas
text: Paul and the guys at Homewood carpet and flooring did a wonderful job removing and installing new carpet in our upstairs! I even had to reschedule them and they fit me in on a Saturday at a moments notice! Everyone I worked with was professional and timely.

name: Kristina Martin
text: So compassionate and helpful. We had a time crunch and extenuating circumstances and they worked within those and did the job well.

name: Kathryn Dorlon
text: Friendly staff! Always looking to make your experience a good one and find the product you are looking for your home!

name: Klaudia Thomas
text: Paul did a great job providing the best customer service, attention to detail, offered his expertise and knowledge in carpet and wood selection process. Price was very competitive with others in the market. The crew was very professional, efficient and accurate. We love our new floors, looks amazing. We highly recommend this company.

name: marybeth kaylor
text: They did a great job refinishing our hardwoods and installing sisal carpet. Very fair, honest, and professional.  Highly recommend and will use again!

text: Excellent and fast service. These guys are top shelf all the way around. If you need flooring you need to call Homewood Flooring!

text: My wife and I need carpet installed in 2 bedrooms and we’re going to do it ourself, until we walked in Homewood Carpet and Flooring and met Paul, who was so helpful in the store helping us pick out the right carpet for our home. He came and took measurements same day and we had a great quote within hours. Paul updated us on ever detail until carpet was here and job was done. Installing team was professional and friendly. Paul came after they finished to do a walk through and checked everything. So blown away by the personable staff, quality products, and thorough service they provided!!!!

name: Renie Moss
text: Paul and his team went above and beyond, beating all the big box store prices and installation timelines.  We had carpet installed in two bedrooms and needed it done prior to an appraisal for refi.  The team was fast and professional. Highly recommend!

The team did the job professionally and actually ahead of schedule.  Having spent three weeks trying to get the job done with a big box store with all types of exceptions, it was a pleasure to have the entire process done is less time.  Highly recommend this team.

name: Mary Morgan
text: This company performed the classic "read the fine print" on my 93-year-old mother. She called them with a coupon to steam clean a room for $12.95. She only wanted two rooms done.She cannot see well and did not see the fine print regarding pre-treatment. Her total bill was $188 -- not a crisis, but for a woman who lives on Social Security, too much. Very misleading. The woman who manages their office refuses to discuss their misleading policy or provide me with a copy of the actual contract that she claims my mother "understood." Best to avoid this company.

name: H Wilson
text: Called them on a $12.95 or rm x 2. $26 + tax went to $69. I had read reviews and though most were quite negative I tried them. I was furious when tech quoted min.chg. Only the walkways of BR needed cleaning. Please go with reviews. Some other companies even worse!!!!

name: Dana Brown
text: This company advertises all the time in my area, so I decided to give them a try since they APPEARED to be more reasonably priced than the company that I usually use and there was the convenience of online booking. Nevertheless, the online booking quoted a price of around $175. When the technicians arrived (in a mazda suv with no markings and no uniforms), the price jumped to $600+. When I said that the cost was more than the online price, I was told that the online prices were "starting" prices. Then, the technician attempted to charge me for an estimation fee, since he drove over 2 hours from MONTGOMERY, yet they advertised in BIRMINGHAM. I refused to pay and had them leave my home. Long story short...DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!! False advertising at it's worst...smh

name: Dan Craig
text:
When the team first showed up they were in there own personal vehicle with NO Company markings. The team also did not have any company logos or uniforms to identify who they were.

We did our walk through and the price that I was quoted for the size of my house changed by 1.5 times. If they actually by square footage then they should be quoting square footage online not by number of rooms and hallways. My quoted price was $159 and it cost $353. I was in such a bind that I had to get it done. It just became very frustrating. Then at the end they emptied there machine in my front yard instead of taking it down to the road.

The guys who showed of were very nice but that doesn’t cover the the false advertising from there advertisements and online service.

This ended up being a terrible situation and they will never be used again or recommended to a friend.

Both Technician and the person in the office have no value for your time. name: Robbie B
text: I would recommend that no one use this company. It’s a scam. They will come out and pull up more stains than you had before they came. They don’t care about stain removal. They cleaned my 5 rooms and it only took them 15 minutes. I’ve used other services in the past, had good results and it took them at least 45 minutes. The only difference was the company and the service provided. They wanted to know if I had a pet just so they could charge some ridiculous rate for no reason. My pet is well taken care of and I make sure there is no odor in the home. Vacuum daily. This was just so they could up charge. If you are not willing to spend an arm and a leg or even if you are and you just want good service DON’T USE THIS COMPANY!!!!!

text: The old bait and switch routine, website posted $39.00 price for 1 room, I had to drive 20 minutes to meet them at my house, they were very nice, came in surveyed the one room, told them I only want it cleaned NO extras, they told me it would be $133.00 for 1 room , ask where the $39.00 for 1 room went to, they told me that was the minimum charge, I told them i wasn't interested, Sears cleans 5 rooms for that price, they were out the door.   SCAM
