name: M P
text:
I used this company for the 1st time last April of 2019. I used the coupon to clean the carpet for 5 rooms. While they were at my house, the supervisor informed me that they have this plan for $70.00 each time I call them for carpet cleaning after their initial service rendered. But of course, I will have to pay extra $$ to be able to avail that plan. The supervisor said, I could call for carpet cleaning every week if I want to and pay only $70.00 each time. It sounded like a good plan so I paid the extra $$ because I know I will be needing more carpet cleaning in the future.
Well, this month (July 2019),  I set up an appointment online and they came to my house today. I told them I availed the $70.00 cleaning fee previously. But to my surprise, they said that they couldn't clean my carpet for $70. I told them that it's a fraud enticing people to agree to pay extra and they won't honor it. So, I told them to leave my house immediately. I definitely will not use them again.
I guess it was my fault when I  agreed to pay extra $$ to avail the $70.00 cleaning fee without signing a written agreement. So beware dealing with this company. Make sure there is a written contract whenever you deal with them. Fyi, they were charging me $500.00 to clean my carpet this time.

resp.text:
Good Afternoon Mrs. Peppers,

Since the tech left your home we have found your original ticket and the tech has tried to contact you. You are under warranty for 2 bedrooms, hallway, and stairs on the MP with a total of $79.80. If you did add other areas to be cleaned there is an additional cost. The tech was trying to tell you that at your house before you asked him to leave your home. We do honor those who are on the MP. When you sign the MP you are given a copy of your receipt/agreement so that you will know how much you will be charged each time in the future.

Thank you,

Steam King

name: Devin Knight
text: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT AT ITS WORST. We received a flyer through the mail that Steam King would clean our carpet for $12.95 a room. We set an appointment up. They show up to my tiny apartment to clean a living and a dining room (a small area). Clearly we are prepared $25. They gave us a bid for $134.42. They told us that the $12.95 didn’t include pre treatment or sanitizing and not doing those two steps would only make the carpet smell worse. They ended up coming down to $88.93. Still then, we said don’t clean the hall and they cleaned the hall way anyways and charged us for an entire room for that one hallway. This is the biggest joke and worst type of service I have ever heard of. They were here a total of 25 minutes, 10 of which we spent discussing the complete lie of an advertisement. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY.

resp.text:
Good Morning Mr. Knight!

We do have the coupon for $12.95 per room and then if you have any heavily soiled areas the carpet may need to be pre-treated. The technician will examine your carpet and determine its needs. While he is there he will also talk with you about the different types of protectants and deodorizers we have to offer. It states on the advertisement pre-conditioning for heavily soiled areas only .28 cents per square foot when needed. That is why the technician goes over all charges with you before anything is started on. Thank you for you services today and I hope you have a good rest of the day.

Thank You,

Steam King

text: I totally disagree with the previous reviews concerning professionalism and costumer service of this company. I have had my carpets/rugs/furniture cleaned in my house by Steam King since 2011. I will agree that the initial cleaning is expensive due to payment for pretreat and protectant, however once the protectant is applied your first cleaning, they will come back out and clean the carpets for only the price it costs to reapply protectant. I have 15 stairs, 3 bedrooms and an area between the rooms and they pretreat/scrub stains, clean carpet, reapply protectant and sanatize for 109. This is a good price for the service provided and the technicians always leave letting me know that if I have any questions or concerns that they are happy to come back out. If you are looking for a company you will be using for your home long term, I would recommend this company.

name: Mike Alexander
text: I provided this review to the company in Nov 2020 and never heard a word back from them.  It is now Jul 2021 so now I am posting here:  I really did not want to leave this review as I really liked the technician that worked at my house as a person.  And I am not requesting that anything be done to make things right.  I am good at this point.  The job that was done on the tile floors was good (with one exception noted later).  What makes me unhappy is when I have to do work to clean up after a job is done.  I was a bit bothered right away when I noticed that the technician was leaving boot prints everywhere he walked on my hardwood floors on his way to the tile floors he was cleaning.  I didn't say anything as he was just starting, and I thought maybe it would be taken care of.  He worked hard and did a good job on the tile floors (with the one exception I will note later).  Once he was finished and was removing the corrugated water line and the machines, rancid smelling water was spilled in some areas on my hardwood floors.  Also, while pulling the corrugated water line out of the house, he pulled it around the corners of a room scuffing the baseboards.  I had to put my foot between the baseboard and the line so it would stop hitting the baseboard.  This prevented it from doing any noticeable damage.  He did bring in a wet mop and attempted to clean the hardwood area but did nothing more than smear the rancid smelling water around which dried leaving a VERY noticeable film on the floor.  I had to clean a fairly large area of the hardwood floor twice to remove the dried, rancid water and most of the smell.  As noted above (the one exception) I also mopped the tile floors he cleaned with vinegar and water as some of the quarter round in the tile floor area had filth on it and I figured some of that floor probably had some of the same rancid water on it.  The rancid water smell stayed in the house for more than a day.  The second cleaning of the hardwood floors and time got rid of the rest of it.   My bet is that the machines and/or the water line contained the rancid water from other jobs.  I really hate leaving comments like this, but it is probably important that the company be made aware of these type of issues for training purposes.

Zerorez is a multi-step process and we learned a lot about the longterm effects of untreated or partially treated pet urine and the downside of commercial enzyme products. We now know how to spot clean in a much better way. Our cream microfiber chair and all 4 carpets look and smell brand new! The results were well worth the price!

text: Excellent job!  The service technician was timely, friendly, and did a great job.  One of the rooms had several pet stains and he was able to get the stains up and the smell out.  The cost is a bit higher than some others in the area, but I would definitely use them again in the future.  The valpak coupon helped:)

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your Zerorez experience Kathy! And you bring up a great point about our pricing compared to traditional carpet cleaners. It is true that we are not the least expensive carpet cleaner in Huntsville, but our patented cleaning technology does provide a better long term value. The difference is our certified zero residue cleaning process. We will explain: with traditional carpet cleaners, soaps and detergents are combined with hot water extraction to clean and sanitize carpets. And although this is a tried and true process, it has a big problem; it's impossible to get all the soap and detergent out of the carpet. And this soapy residue (which can feel a little crunchy under your feet after drying) ends up acting like a dirt magnet which results in spots and traffic lanes reappearing. But with the Zerorez patented process, we do not use soaps and detergents to clean and sanitize carpets but instead a revolutionary, and completely non-toxic, solution called Empowered Water. This process results in a zero residue cleaning, and without residue, carpets stay cleaner, longer. Additionally, they feel softer than you can imagine. Thank you again for your business and fantastic review! We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Lynn Bruce
text: I bought a new home from an elderly woman who had a friend surface clean for her. Because of time restraints, I decided to hire a cleaning service to come in to deep clean before moving in. I explained to the owner that I needed my home deep cleaned and move in ready. The house was completely emptied and easy to maneuver around in. One employee showed up with a helper friend late afternoon. Long story short, they surface cleaned my house. I had to go behind them to ask questions like: "Did you clean the top of the cabinets, did you wipe down doors, did you clean the windows," etc. because it wasn't being done. As I inspected the kitchen, I noticed dried food stuck on the cabinets, dust on top of the cabinets, which I asked them to go back and clean -same experience in the bathrooms. One of the last tasks was mopping the floor. As one lady mopped, I noticed a small puddle of water on the floor, so I wiped it up. I looked at the white napkin in my hand and it was gray. Yes, she mopped my bathroom and kitchen floors with a filthy mop. I brought it to her attention and the second lady mopped behind the first one with another dirty mop. I seriously thought about asking the ladies to leave early, but I overheard one of them talking on the phone (at work) telling the caller that she was trying to make some money and would be home soon. After hearing that, I decided to allow them to finish the job. I paid the $150 but was extremely dissatisfied.

This is the worst carpet cleaning company in Mobile Alabama. Do not waste your time calling or contacting or allowing these people to come out to your house. This man is extremely rude, very unprofessional, disrespectful, no customer service at all.I ran across this business because I was going shopping with my mother And saw the advertisement for carpet cleaning services on the side of an SUV and decided to hire a black owned business. Trying to support my community. I decided to go ahead with Jeff carpet cleaning services because he was black owned. From the moment I got on the phone with Mr. Jeff he was rude and nasty with a very unprofessional tone. He gave me a ridiculously high quote “very high even among the competitors in this area.But I decided to stick it out with him because I understood why I was using this business. So I begin to recruit my family and friends to come over to my house the day before the services are supposed to be rendered and remove all the bedroom furniture out of all the rooms that were I discussed with Jeff. We stayed up all night removing four bedrooms into the hallway, a kitchen and a dining room.  The day the services are supposed to be rendered, three hours before Mr. Jeff was supposed to come out to my house to clean my carpet he calls me and tells me he will not be able to clean my carpet due to the fact that I did not purchase the stair cleaning. Something he could have told me the day he came out to the house and I refuse the stair cleaning. He wait to the day of my appointment to call me and let me know very rudely and disrespectfully that he was not coming out to clean my carpet because of this. When I express my deepest concern about this matter he was very rude and very very nasty. I told him that his services were no longer need it I hung up the phone in his face and I contacted another carpet cleaning services that offer same-day service and they were $60 less than what Mr. Jeff was trying to overcharge me for four small rooms of carpet and one stairs. I am telling you now do not use this carpet cleaning services. There are so many carpet cleaning services out here that will offer you value, quality, and professionalism. This is not one of those places.

BUYER BEWARE!!!

resp.text: We are Jerry's Carpet Cleaning.  Don't know a "Jeff".

name: Yvonne Rhodes
text: Called Jerry because I had heard his company does a good job.  That was an understatement.  He did a great job for us!  We have a rental unit that was left in a smelly, filthy, dirty, sticky, yucky mess.  You could not tell the carpet was originally white Berber.  It was truly a mess.  The new renters were scheduled to move in that afternoon and Jerry was able to get there at 6:30 am.  He even hand scrubbed spots where the stains were particularly stubborn.  My husband and I are extremely impressed.  We were sure we were going to have to replace the carpet.  The carpet now looks and smells great.

resp.text: We are happy to provide you with great service!  Thank you for the review.

name: aisia snow
text: I had him for a carpet cleaning in my apartment because my apartment complex required that we have a professional carpet cleaner do our floors. He cleaned everything but the red dye. They had on the website that they were able to remove red dye but he said “ he wasn’t able to get it out”. So, I basically gave him money for nothing and he was late and  in a rush.

resp.text: We always tell people that red dye removal is an extra service.  If it doesn't come up with the regular carpet cleaning then an additional process is required and therefore an additional charge.  We have had training in red dye removal and it works every time.

name: Sean Jadwin
text: I was quoted a price for a three bedroom house and then when he gets to my house he changes his pricing saying that he quoted me to clean three bed rooms!?!?!  I had him do the job anyway and the next day I notice that the corners of my walls in my hallways are now rubbed black and the the bottom of the corners, the paint is chipped away.  This was not like this before.  I call him and he tells me that his crew uses protecters to protect corners. My mother in law was there so I asked her if the used any protetctors and she told me they did not.  I call him back and he continues to argue with me so I tell him to come to my house so I can show him.  He comes the next day and tells me that his crew did use the protectors (calling my mother in law a liar) and that he did not do the damage to my wall corners that was not there before he cleaned my carpets.  (Now calling me a liar)  He continually argued with me and then said I am a christian!!  In my business, when a customer shows me damages to a vehicle, I say I am sorry maam or sir let me get that fixed for you.  This guys needs to learn a little bit more about large company customer service.

resp.text: We always offer pricing per room to be cleaned.  So a 3-bedroom house may have a living room, den, etc. plus 3 bedrooms.   We do not damage walls and are always very careful.

name: Jeremiah Quattrone
text: Before I chose a carpet cleaning service, I read all the reviews I could.  Jerry's seems the best choice.  Sadly, it was a horrible experience.  My zip code is for Eightmile, but i live just past eightmile in the country.  Apparently this was a big issue, as the men from Jerry's showed up and immediately began to fuss saying that I did not live in eightmile.  I offered to show them some of my mail to prove it.  This led to more fussing, to the point that I asked them to leave.  They never even saw the carpet I needed cleaned.  Very sad

resp.text: Three of my workers drove 45 minutes from Mobile to get to what was supposed to be Eight Mile.  When we got there he had more rooms to be cleaned than he originally stated so our price was going to be more.  We were not even going to charge him a trip charge.  But he refused to let us clean the carpets.  We want all our customers to be happy but sometimes that is beyond our control.

name: Val E
text:
Not satisfied!! I purchased a preowned home. I call The Maids and explained to them that the house was empty and In need of a deep clean (everything to be cleaned). I was told not to worry that everything would be cleaned. After they arrived, the manager said that she needed to increase the price $180 because I had a lot of kitchen cabinets. (They were already there, so I agreed).

As I did the walk through I was finding stuff that wasn’t cleaned and they were going back trying to clean it. After they left I looked over my house and OMG! My house was NOT CLEANED. My floors were still dirty, I swept and mopped and the mop water was Black. The bathrooms were NOT cleaned, refrigerator wasn’t cleaned, cabinets were not cleaned, dust and spider webs still remain in certain areas. It was so much that I discovered that wasn’t cleaned. I literally had to clean my house myself.  I do want to say that they did clean my baseboards and the plantation blinds. When I notified their office and sent pictures, they asked if I wanted them to come back out. My reply was NOooooooo. You have already shown me how you clean. So she did take off the $180 up-charge.  For the amount of money that I paid I was just expecting my house to be squeaky clean. I was highly disappointed. I just don’t want anyone else to make the same mistake of having high expectations from THE MAIDS.

resp.text: Val - My apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced with our company. We work hard to provide a professional, quality clean that we stand behind. In fact, we have a 100% satisfaction guarantee, which is why we offered to go back to take care of anything we may have missed and be certain you’re completely satisfied with our service. At The Maids, customer service is extremely important to us and we always strive for 100% customer satisfaction.  Please contact our office to let us know what we can do to get the issue resolved.

text:
Cleaning and More overcharged my debit card by $400 for a uhaul rental.  I called Monday morning as soon as they opened and they told me it was their mistake they would reverse it.   I didn't call again until Thursday as I was trying to be patient.  Thursday my account was overdrawn and they told me they couldn't do anything about it to call Uhaul.   If I had a business and my mistake had caused someone the problems this has caused me I would have figured out how to get that person their money back.  Not take their money and then say my hands are tied.
Very unprofessional, horrible customer service.  Most definitely do not do business here if you can avoid it.

name: Jennifer Varnell
text: BEWARE.  I recently had a horrible experience with this company.  I had contracted them to clean very specific parts of a rental I own but when then tenants showed up for move in, the unit was not clean.  Only one item we had agreed to was actually clean.  I then had to go to the townhouse and clean for 2 hours myself so my tenets could move in.  The floors were not swept or mopped, appliances and cabinets not wiped down as agreed. Fans and window sills filthy, even though we discussed doing this in advance and it is outlined on the invoice. I even sent them pictures.  What's worse is that even after I contacted them, they never called me back and still charged my card!  I have disputed this with my credit card company, but what a hassle.  Save yourself the trouble and get a company that will do what is right when they make a mistake. The pictures below are just a small sampling of what it looked like "after" the cleaning!

name: Anna Claire Stinson
text: After a no show from another local cleaner, CSI was able to fit me in at the last minute. The team did an incredible move-in clean and was prompt, professional, and thorough. Alana, the representative I spoke with on the phone, was courteous, friendly, and determined to keeping us on schedule for our move. I highly recommend CSI and will certainly use them in the future.

name: scott pilkington
text: We've been using CSI weekly cleaning sefrvice for at least 10 years and are always very pleased with the job they do. We highly recommend them.

name: Vickie Bolling
text:
I am so impressed with CSI. They're so good and efficient. From the first interaction with them, they are very friendly and informative. I absolutely love Tania and Alyssa--what a team!
My house has a lot of books--done--theyre all dusted. My house is old;they make it look better (cleaning done correctly has that effect). I'm a little bit of a clutterbug--they magically organize the little things like exposed cords, kitchen stuff put where it belongs--what a concept!  Tania and Allysa make things I don't even notice cleaner and better. They're also kind and considerate in my home.

resp.text: Thank you Vickie for your feedback. We absolutely adore you as a customer and hope to keep this relationship for a very long time. Tania and Alyssa have talked about how much they love and appreciate you.

name: Candice Hamilton
text: I have loved working with CSI! We had a pipe burst in our kitchen which sent water into our kitchen, laundry room, living room and dining room. CSI packed us out and moved our furniture back in after our renovations were complete. They sent a cleaning crew to deep clean all of the dust and grit that was stirred up during the renovation process. The ladies that they sent were fabulous!!! They were quick but efficient, and my house looked and smelled amazing. Thank you CSI!!

name: Jessica Torres
text: I highly recommend this company the girls are amazing at what they do ❤️

name: Randy Rogers
text: This company is on time and does a great job. Kelsey is always super nice and does a great job. We request her on every job. I would recommend this company to everybody.

name: Erica Odell
text: I recently had them do a move out clean. Upon walking in I immediately noticed base boards that were not done in several rooms. (This was the main thing I asked them to do). Floors looked swept but not mopped. Windows still filthy. I had to spend several hours cleaning after them keeping me up till midnight the night before I moved. Not worth the almost 300 I spent.

name: Beth Bowman
text: Its amazing what these carpet guys can do. Ours went from stained and gross, to practically spotless. Should have hired them a long time ago!

name: Oscar Fernandez
text: Have a working partnership with them. They do great work.

name: Aaron Folta
text: I've trusted CSI with my carpet cleaning needs for years, and they continue to exceed my expectations. I've recently used their Maid service for general cleaning. I may never need to clean again! Not only do they GUARANTY their work, but they're honest and they get the job done at an affordable price. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

name: Josh Poole (Pooleus)
text: Our water heater flooded our house, and thankfully CSI took care of us! They responded quickly and did a great job. Rick was friendly and knowledgable. We will call them again for any water damage needs!

name: Angel Mangram
text: I LOVE THESE PEOPLE..

name: alex stance
text: CSI Cleaning & Restoration did a great job the move in cleaning they did at our new home in Opelika AL. The walls and crown molding were filthy, and CSI made short work of it and all the rest of the kitchen and bathrooms. The carpet cleaning was top notch as well. I tell others about the cleaning service all the time.

name: John Folta
text: I highly recommend this company. They did a great job.

name: Hayden J
text: CSI always does a great job! Love how they clean our house!

name: Katrina Paxson
text: CSI does a great job!  Employees are always friendly and willing to do what is asked of them.

name: Elliott Wood
text: Not impressed. Watched the crew show up in the driveway momentarily and left. Never knocked on the door and never called the contact number I provided.

name: Brandon Marcello
text: Terrible. Spots of house completely skipped by cleaning crew. No idea what they did for five hours other than burn time. They also left my doors and garage door unlocked without notifying me they were finished. Complete waste.

name: Amanda Marcello
text:
Pretty unsatisfied with the 5-hour  "deep clean" service we had today. We hired this company to thoroughly clean a house we just purchased so it would be spotless prior to moving in. Upon arrival to our house this afternoon, right off the bat we noticed they left the garage door up with our belongings in plain view. The front door was unlocked as well. The crew was nowhere to be found.

As we looked around to see what had been done, here are just a few things we noticed:
-soap scum in the shower
-hair in the sink/tubs
-microwave not cleaned
-oven not cleaned
-things on kitchen countertops that would have easily been brushed away even if wiped with a dry cloth

We were supposed to be notified prior to the crew leaving and we weren't. I tried to call the office at 4:30 pm and no one answered.

I am very dissatisfied with the level of service. Book this company at your own risk.

name: Kaylen Anderson
text: We had my Mom's carpets cleaned, and we were very happy with the results!  Her carpets were pretty bad, they exceeding our expectations of how they would turn out.

name: Bobby Canady
text: Nothing there but private homes in suburb area

name: Tammy Walker
text: We were so pleased with the quality of work from Services Unlimited. The staff was friendly. They were able to come right away and extract the flooding and then provided cleaning to the areas that needed it as well.

name: Ronald Edwards
text: I guess so

name: Jennifer Roberson
text: W&S was recommended to me by several different people. They did a wonderful job and their prices are fair. I will absolutely be using them again in the future. Super sweet people! Definitely recommend!!

name: Amy Pate
text: I highly recommend W&S!! They removed stains from our carpet I never thought would come up! I was kept updated on very single step of the process and they were so accommodating to our schedule!! Very prompt and friendly! Thank you so much, we will definitely use you again!!!

name: TaDarius Hooper
text: Great customer service! The job was done professionally, efficiently, and at a great price compared to other carpet cleaning services. Walter did a great job with my carpet and my couch. I couldn't be more pleased!

name: Zac Kennedy

W&S Professional Carpet Cleaning worked with me to clean the carpets in a Calera home I'm listing, and I could not be more thankful and impressed with their service. They were there on time, did an incredible job quickly and I highly recommend using their service for preparing your home for the market.

name: Nancy Carlisle
text: Highly recommended professional and and friendly and did a great job on the carpet thanks so much

name: Nancy Davis
text: Thank you both so much for doing such a wonderful job!

name: Jackie Seale

name: alicia price
text: Very professional and did an amazing job.. I highly recommend if you want the job done perfect.

name: Countess Fleming

name: Allison Rosser

name: Summer Steward
text:
Pleasant, efficient, carpet clean and looks new!!
Easy to book with...price extremely reasonable!
Highly recommend you check them out!!

name: David.Charlotte Grewe
text: We had our carpets and 2 sofas cleaned.  What an amazing job.  Everything looks brand new.  I highly recommend them and will be a repeat customer for sure.  They were prompt, professional and so easy to work with.

name: Jennifer Perry
text: Dylan and Wade were very professional. They did an AMAZING job. I honestly did not know my carpets could look so good. They look brand new again. Thank you both for your service. I will be recommending y’all to many people to come!

name: Jay Bain
text: Been using these folks for several years, and they have added years to my carpets and furniture.  Nice folks to have around, and dependable about showing up.

name: Kayla Adams
text: Russel and his son have a 10 star rating from our home. I am a returning customer and both times they have met my expectations of carpet cleaning. Very respectful and friendly attitudes. Would recommend to anyone and would use again.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kayla. Glad you’re happy with the results!

name: Wes Vardaman
text: Superior has cleaned my carpets twice. Did an excellent job both times! As good or better than any other company has ever done.

resp.text: Thank you, Wes! We’re thrilled that you’re happy with our services.

name: Qi Wan
text:
We set up for carpet cleaning at 2 pm on 12/11/2020. But the people did not show up on time. I had to leave by that time. When Jay (I am not sure the spelling) called me around 2:30 pm I asked him what time was it? He said he did not know? Very unprofessional. I ended up not using the service.

Owner responded today stating that I insisted the appointment time was 1:30pm. Look at my complaint. I did say the appointment time was 2 pm. He claimed that he showed up on time. Please see the screen shot of the time he called? 2:29 pm. Another person actually called first from a different number and claimed to be from Superior Cleaning.  You simply cannot lie. Do you have proof that you showed up on time? I uploaded the screen shot and not sure if it will show up.

resp.text: mr woan was scheduled for 2 pm....crew was on time....he insisted appt was for 1:30....sorry we could not come to agreement on time.....we always strive for excellence

name: Kimberly Evans
text: They were very professional and engaging with me. Everything was cleaned extremely well including my pet stains. Have another appointment scheduled for them to clean my tile and grout. Great company!

resp.text: It’s always a pleasure doing business with clients like you Kimberly. We look forward to working with you again soon!

name: Companion Animal Care
text: The team does a fantastic job all the way around. Great team cleaning carpets and a great guy that did amazing carpet repairs as well. Definitely recommended them for it all.

resp.text: Thanks for the great recommendation! Great to hear you are satisfied with everything!

name: Deborah Peterson
text:
I recently used this service to clean 5 area rugs. First, it took a month to bring my rugs back, then brought out the wrong rugs.  Also, my large living room rug was torn on the side and has a large lump in the middle. I still have someone else's rug that's not mines. The four rugs that were returned to me was not cleaned and had a bad oder in it.  I have made numerous calls and left messages for someone to call me back with no response from this company. I do not recommend this company at all!

The response the owner submitted is a blatant lie.  After numerous attempts to speak with the company, someone finally returned my call and informed me that they had given my rug to the wrong customer and assured me that they would return my rug and pick up the rug they gave to me in error.  I have not received my rug yet and I stopped payment on the check I had paid for the poor cleaning of the rugs they did return to me. Now it has been too long since they initially told me that they would return my rug until I don't care what they do with it.  I will replace my rug with the  money from the check I stopped payment on.  Thank you and have a great day!

resp.text: Ms pederson has repeatedly ignored our attempts to reach her... she had work done for discounted prices.....repeat customer..  and has refused to answer calls regarding the rug that she will not return....THE rug is another customers....our reputation should not be questioned because of customers actions.

name: Russell Mcferrin
text: This family business if the most experienced in the area....very impressed by professionalism and not high pressure corporation sales tactics.....highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to rate us!

name: Deanna Swinford
text: Great work and will use again in the future!

resp.text: Deanna, We’re looking forward to working with you again soon :)

name: Rodney cater
text: Be careful signing agreement on invoice sheet cause once they do damage to your belongings (in my case) sofa cleaning ....they made rips on my cushions and the owner Do NOT address the issue! So in other words you are gambling with their service because if they mess or damage your belongings U are COMPLETELY on your own ! Call Stanely instead !!!

resp.text: Sofa was previously damaged..  we have pictures..  analyzed the sofa.   We informed cutomer that we did not cause the tiny tear on sofa..   Also resewed sofa for free as a nice jester.

name: Jeff Moorehead
text: I don't know.  I did not use Superior Carpet Cleaner

resp.text: Well then why r u rating ?

name: Savannah Jackson
text: Receive an appointment that works with my schedule EVERY TIME I use them. Very well mannered and kind employees. They have always showed up on time and never leave until I’m satisfied with the service. I would recommend them 1 million times. I will never use anyone else.

resp.text: Happy to know you were satisfied with our services, Savannah! Thank you for leaving a kind review!

name: Olger Burch
text: Russell and Team truly outstanding. Prices outstanding and services nothing but the Best. Thank you see you next time!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Max Tall
text: Ok so I am looking to get my carpet cleaned again and it reminded me I did not do a review on the service I got with these guys in May.  The carpet looked good after the cleaning but the billing is the issue.  I got charged for the service and the card reader or software was not working on his phone so my card number was manually enter in which is fine until 4 days later I get a charge again for another amount which was manually enter in again which means my information was saved.  I called and spoke with Russell about the issue and he said would call me back...this never happened so I called my card company and they provided me the details about my card information being entered in manually at a different location 4 days later so they transferred me to the fraud department which disputed the charges since they saw this as fraud.  Till this day I have still never heard back from the manager on why this happened or that he was going to issue me a credit.  .......Update Oct 2020:  Wow took you a year to reply and no nothing is inaccurate, try putting a little more time into your reply so people may believe you...never going to use you again anyhow!  I save everything and would be more than happy to post a photo of the transactions and the letter back from my credit card company removing the charge do to the fraudulent charge.

resp.text: He was charged in a true manner...bogus claim.

name: Bliss Burton
text:
Great results and professional service! I am super hesitant about who I let in my home, but the crew was very professional and down to earth so I had no hesitation!

They call before they arrive to let you know they are on the way, they arrived on time, were fast, professional, and pleasant to deal with despite my demands. ;) Grest service and great outcome!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Bliss!  We really appreciate your feedback.

name: Stephanie Mcferrin
text: this company worked me in on short notice, very professional and experienced. Very friendly employees. Family owned highly recommended!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Stephanie!

name: Brian Dunbar
text: Superior Carpet Cleaning worked with me through 2 appointment cancellations and even set an appointment next day with little notice. In this time I spoke with both management and service people and they were all unflinchingly friendly despite having to schedule around my inconvenient circumstances.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to post your thoughts, Brian!

name: Damien Barbour
text: This company is very professional, we have used them for many years. Highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you for your loyalty, Damien! It means so much to us!

name: christine winters
text: Ed was very professional and the quality of the upholstery cleaning was amazing.  If they had a sixth star I would of chose that.  I highly recommend them for any cleaning services!!! Thank you Ed!!

name: Denise Alawine
text: We had the carpets and slate floor cleaned at our office. Spectacular job! Our floors were terrible! Ed is an actual wizard. No doubt. Very professional, efficient, and can apparently perform miracles. Highly recommend this company.

name: Amy Gerbig
text: Great service. They came and clean the carpets at work. They a great job with great rates. Most affordable!! Thank you

name: Essina Carter
text: What an amazing experience with a great local company!! My husband and I were both hesitant about trusting anyone to clean our hand scraped hardwood floors.. We could not have made a better choice in choosing Nurses Touch!! The husband and wife team were so knowledgeable and super friendly. I can be a stickler.. And I don’t have one complaint. Our floors look beautiful!!! I will be recommending them to all of our family and friends.

name: Jeremy Johnson
text: This company has great service! I have used them twice now, once for cleaning the carpets throughout my entire house and once for cleaning my mattress and carpet after my son spilled an entire cup of juice in my bed. Both times using them they were on time, thorough, and friendly. I highly recommend them.

name: Mitch Schenkel
text: Nurse's Touch did a fantastic job with our carpets when we were moving out! After years of dirt, grime and drink stains, the carpets looked like new. We also had them do a recliner of ours. Once they were done, it looked and smelled like the day we got it. "A" class company all the way from the first call to them, appointment setting, work itself and the customer service with a smile.

name: Deucejack
text: Ed did an amazing job cleaning our carpets!! He was super thorough and made sure he worked to get every stain up! We have three little ones and they are pretty rough on our carpet but now after Ed cleaned it, it looks brand new!! We won't be using anyone else ;)

name: Candice Williams
text: Called around 3pm and he arrived at 4pm. Very fast service for a work in. Carpet looks brand new!! And wasn't soggy like other companies have your floor.  Very nice and very Reasonable price. Thoroughly satisfied!!!!

name: Laurie Watson McKay
text: Great job! Made my carpets look brand new! Got rid of 20-year old stains! Great customer service and fantastic service. Highly recommend! Thanks Ed!

name: Brittany Sanford
text: Ed and Lesleigh are truly two amazing and very professional people. I am beyond pleased with my services. The were very informative , on time, friendly and just down right great genuine people. I googled around to find a company that could possibly do work on a Sunday. Upon my findings Nurse's Touch came up. I scheduled an appointment with Ed. The day of service came and I received a courtesy call from Lesleigh to inform me that they were in route. When they arrived the greeted with big smiles and a firm handshake. The results are amazing. I truly thank you guys for all of your hard work and I will be sending you more clients.

name: Juanita Seel
text: Carpets were so clean... they even cleaned my tile and it looked great. Professional, enthusiastic and thorough.

name: Kaleigh Pritchard
text: Very professional and reasonably priced! Removed all stains from our office carpet! 10/10 would recommend to anyone!

name: Trevor McFarlin
text: Excellent, professional service company. The difference in our house is night and day. Thanks again for your service! A+++

name: keith kilgore
text: Ed with Nurses Touch did a fantastic job we had our carpets cleaned and our tile  and grout...I highly recommend this company very professional and on time

name: Jon-Michael Thiroux
text: Made quick work and my carpets looked brand new

name: Bridget C
text: Fast services. Carpet smells fresh and looks great!

name: E. B. Peebles
text: Did a very professional job.

name: Monique “BlackBetty” Nelson
text: When I say amazing service, I mean amazing service. This is my 2nd time using them and I will continue. My sons carpet looked like it needed to be replaced it was so bad. Got all carpet clean and my sons carpet looks brand new so does mine and my daughter. Just had to leave a review because people will post negative but not the positive. I give you guys 10 👏🏽🙏🏾

resp.text: Thank you for having us out!

name: Nancy Cook
text: Never returned calls

resp.text: We apologize for somehow missing your phone call. Quick check through the messages and can't find your voicemail. Not sure how that happened. We take pride in our work and enjoy talking w everyone! Again, my apologies.

name: Beckie Rapier
text: My experience with Michael Biggs and Chem Dry of the Port City was professional and he was knowledgeable in products used. He was conscious in making sure my dog was not harmed or scared while he cleaned the carpet. I would definitely use him again and recommend his services to my friends or anyone who needs his type of service.

name: Courtney Dortch
text: Mike does an awesome job. He's very professional, punctual, and informative.  I will/do recommend him for any cleaning services. 110% satisfied with his services!!!

name: Philip Schermer III
text: Absolutely amazing service. Mike was on time and professional. I will definitely use them again.

name: Patrick E

name: April Pace
text: LOVE Mr. MIKE ALWAYS SO KIND

text: Always very accommodating and do a great job!

resp.text: Drew, Thank you so much for the positive review! We are always Here to Help! Please let us know if there are any other services we can provide for you. Thank you!!

name: Weaver Rentals
text: We have used Servpro of Tuscaloosa for a number of jobs and consults. They are efficient, take time to explain what is happening, and always do a great job completing the task at hand. Would definitely recommend. A+

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We appreciate your business! We always strive to be better!

name: Neil Shah
text: Great experience with this team. Project manager David beck was always available and helpful throughout the entire project and worked diligently to ensure all our concerns were addressed and handled in a timely manner. The final outcome of the house was great and we could not be happier. Thanks so much.

resp.text: Mr. Shah, thank you for spreading the positivity of our team!

name: Jennifer Lauth
text: This company has been great with some of the apartment communities I help manage when it comes to water restoration and remediation. They are usually the quickest to respond, most diligent in getting me the information I need, and our rep is really great at advising us on how to move forward.

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer for your kind words! We are always striving to do better and be faster!

name: Brandi Todd
text: I've had several encounters with Servpro as a resident and employee at The Woodlands. Servpro was sent to take care of a leak in our apartment. They arrived very quickly to assess the damage and immediately started working to restore our apartment. The staff is fantastic, and they do a great job of handling all our emergencies here!

name: Heather Lanphere
text: Jake Wood is such a fantastic guy! Very professional and excited about his job!!!

resp.text:
Heather,

Thank you so much for your kind words. We think Jake is a pretty great guy ourselves! 😃 Give is a call for your next mitigation or reconstruction need!

name: Billy Jordan
text: Servpro was awesome. Came out quickly and got our crawl space dried within hours. Recommend them to anybody who needs something done right.

name: Heather McCormick
text:
Do not use this company whatever you do. I had my  rental house flood and it was the worst experience of my life using Serve Pro of Tuscaloosa.I had to call them 3-5 times to even go to the house to get the clean up  process started.Kept being told they was going out to start and when contractors went to give me estimates on repairs there would be no one at the house working on the clean up.They have lied to me several times about my property.Told me several different start and finish dates.They left drying fans in my house 7 days running after they had already cut the drywall and  insulation out. Drew one of the sales guys made up stories about the situation, told my tenant I had told him things when I hadn't even talked to the guy yet and told two different things ones to me and my tenant .I asked Drew why he did this and let him know I would be calling the office and  he proceeded to call my tenant a couple of times and send me a  6 page text over the situation which I found very unprofessional . When I called to complain about this Jacob the owners son took  up for the actions, was rude to me, did not listen to me and acted like I was bothering him.I was told my cabinets needed replaced when they did not. They pulled the vanity out of my master bathroom that did not need pulled out to begin with  without cutting the caulk and when they pulled the vanity it caused the mirror in the bathroom to fall on the sink shattering my mirror and busting my sink in the bathroom and tried to blame it on the heat in the room.I called  David the head of the construction department several times asking a start date and was told no repairs would be started  until they had 18 thousand upfront, Half the cost, and to ask my adjuster to call  his cooperate office and have Fed Ex deliver it to them.I asked my adjuster about it and he said that they did not that money upfront and was beyond shocked I had been told that.They still have their little lock box on my door a week after I told them I will not be using their services anymore, I have called four times to ask to have removed.I have called and asked  three times to speak to the owner of the franchise and got no response. The office staff is not friendly, they have horrible attitudes and make you feel  brushed off.  Brandy the girl in the office is very rude and  blows me off and acts like I'm a bother to her when I call to ask to speak to a manager or owner  . This is the most unprofessional company I have ever came into contact with in my life. And I strongly suggest people think  twice before using them for any reason. You will regret it if you  use this company, trust me on that.They thought since it was an insurance claim they would  take me for a run and rob me and  my insurance company blind and have caused me nothing  but a headache and  added stress from what happened to my home.

Chelsea
don't know how to reply to you  but this way. I too have a  job. Cant answer my phone if I'm busy.I have been trying to contact the owner since June 1st regarding all my issues when they first began.Have called several times .Today is June 20 and first attempt to be reached out to by the owner. You need  new office staff and employees that don't lie to customers and be extremely rude to them. I want my sink and my mirror replaced that was broken courtesy of your employees negligence. Thank you.

resp.text: Good morning Heather, I am deeply sorry you have not had a good experience talking with our staff. I have notified the owner, when we received your yelp review also. It looks like he tried to call about 9:00 am this morning. Please feel free to reach out at any time or email us at servpro8822@servprooftuscaloosa.com. The office has been directed to patch you through to him direct, if he is in during our office hours 8am-5:00 pm. I will follow up with him this afternoon to try and reach you again. I apologize for your less than ideal customer experience during this event in your home. The owner and I would be happy to work with you to figure out where communication errors started and how we can correct them in the future.  - Chelsea

name: Tammy
text:
They were all very sweet and helpful when they came out to our house for a house fire. But then everything got very confusing. We didn't know what was going to happen or when. Then they came in and packed all of our things up, first our clothes and no one told us to keep out any clothes. So we had no clothes blankets or pillows by the time they finished. There was 2 rooms that just had to be cleaned but they threw out our beds and furniture and took out all the carpet. We put notes on two closets and put don't enter.. I found the notes in the floor when we returned. They packed up everything and took it with them but nothing was cleaned it was just in the box they had packed it in.
They told us they we're going to clean the duck work, it was not cleaned, the ceiling fans were not cleaned nor were the blinds. We have had to just  about replace everything  we own plus we had use or own  money to eat at the hotel for   for over 2 months. Being nice is great but we had to many people telling us different things..it took a month after we got to come home before they started bring things back. It made difficult to cook. We had to buy new pots just fry an egg.
When they finally brought things back they were very confused about everything because the young guy and 3 woman that packed us up were fired. They didn't seem to know what was ours and what wasn't.  There are quite a few things missing.  Some of the items are antique and can't be replaced.  The thing is these items problem  went to someone else  and they just saw it was old and not there's. Maybe I need to go check the thrift store.  I didn't think this was going to be easy but this has been a nightmare. I have items that have tags on them, but they didn't take them or clean them. My blinds still have soot on them and it is not easy to clean. They we're supposed to clean and check or duct work , not even touched. And we saw the check our insurance sent them and that was way too much for this mess. This is the first time in 15 years we have made a claim on our house or auto  and now State Farm will not cover our house anymore. So we are going to have to sale our house and move because this put us in the red.

resp.text:
Tammy, I am so sorry for your bad experience with our crews. This is the first we have heard of any issue with your loss. We are trying to look into it internally, but would love for you to call the office at 553-8377 and let us know more so that we can get this issue resolved and make sure everything met to your satisfaction. - Chelsea

Tammy, Thank you for editing your review so that we may have a little insight on why you are unhappy with SERVPRO. I would like to also thank you for your kind words on our crews being "sweet and helpful." I can address that clothing and other textiles were cleaned by another company and not by SERVPRO of Tuscaloosa. We would like you to reach out to our General Manager and Owner at 205-553-8377 when you are comfortable and allow us to address and mend your concerns that we do have control over. Any issues between the claim and your insurance provider will have to be handled through their customer service, as our company does not have direct correlation between your insurance coverage. Again, we are sorry for the headache that was truly in control of our Franchise and the General Manager/Owner would, again, invite you to call and see how we can clear up confusion and give us the opportunity to fix what we are able to.

name: Christina Graham
text:
Please consider this review a PSA! Do NOT use this place. Perhaps if you are a corporate client, they will do well on your job. If you are individual customer, they likely will perform extremely poorly.

I was lied to on a couple of different occasions with my job, in particular about them contacting my insurance and the times that they did so. They typically arrived late (45 min to 1 hour) or on one occasion, they were so late that I was told to not even bother waiting. This was actually after being told by the person managing my job (supposedly managing it) that he thought they were finished up at my place. NOPE! Even after officially signing off that they were done, I brought in another mitigation company...and they are currently finishing the job that ServPro was hired to do.

There are major breaks in communication internally, as well as externally. I wouldn't recommend this company to my worst enemy. Please don't use them and keep them in business any longer.

resp.text: Christina, this is deeply disturbing news to read. We did not know you had any concerns during your experience with SERVPRO of Tuscaloosa. Our office deeply apologizes for your additional distress in your experience with our crews. Residential claims are very important to us as well and we strive to do our best whether we are in a residential home or commercial business. We are very sorry you feel you did not receive our best. Our owners and management are actively investigating your claim file and you will hear from us directly with more questions and information soon. We want to make sure you are taken care of properly and wish that we had known throughout the job process that you were unhappy with the crew in your home.

name: Tully Corbett
text: Great people to work with.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your business!

name: Tricia Gray
text: ServPro has been amazing! They showed up on short notice and worked diligently until the job was done. We were on a time crunch to get the crawl space of a house dried out before closing and ServPro made it happen! Their staff was friendly and helpful and I could not recommend them more!

name: Dennis Rykaczewski
text: My experience with Servpro Tuscaloosa was a very good one. They where prompt and completed the work just as they said they would. I would use them again and refer them to my friends. Thanks

name: Sam Kott
text: Very professional, helpful and handled the job very well and with the upmost respect for my property.

name: Adam Beams
text: These guys are great and go the extra mile.  As a Real Estate Professional, I  can always rely on these guys!

name: Kelyin Jefferies
text: One of the most unprofessional establishments in Tuscaloosa.Extremely rude office staff. Calls never returned when requested. The managers are  rude and very unprofessional .Basically their a very  rude dishonest company and will be anything but  honest with you .

resp.text: I apologize Kelyin. We do not have any records of you with our franchise. Please reach out to our customer service email servpro8822@servprooftuscaloosa.com or call 205-553-8377. We would love to hear more about your concerns and how we can rectify the situation.

name: Brittany Gentry
text: Our experience with Servpro was professional and efficient! We came home from church to a leak in our kitchen during the Christmas holidays. Servpro was at our house within the hour cleaning things up and getting it all taken care of! I can't sing their praises enough! We will definitely use them again if ever needed! I highly recommend their services!

name: Lee Crawford
text: Servpro of Tuscaloosa is the quickest to respond to any type of restoration need you may have.  They're fast and friendly.  I've been in the insurance industry for over 20 years and never seen a more professional group than Servpro.  They will get the job done fast, and get it done right the first time. They do it all, fire, water damage, smoke, cleanup.   Call Justin or Chris 339-5022, they'll take care of you!!!!

name: Wes Graff
text: These people are basically crooks. I had an incident with a customer involving a drain line that leaked into the floor overnight and made a mess. I went out to see the damage myself before we called servpro out to clean it up. It was very minimal water on the floor. The only reason I didn't clean it up myself is because I didn't have a shop vac on my truck and thought it shouldn't cost more than a few hundred dollars to get it cleaned up, even though it was on the weekend, because there just honestly was very little that needed to be done. I was wrong. They charged me over a thousand dollars to do almost nothing besides vacuum up a small amount of water. Then on top of that they left their water bucket in the hallway over the weekend. It leaked water into the stairwell and ruined some of my clients ceiling tiles. When confronted about this Servpro management said that their bucket doesn't leak and that they were not going to replace the tiles. Please do not contact Servpro, they will take advantage of you on every turn.

name: LP
text: Professional Staff!  Very helpful and knowledgeable.

name: amy bentley
text: Can't say enough about the professionalism and service we received from ServPro in Tuscaloosa. Would highly recommend!

name: Thomas Billups
text:
My experience with Servpro of Tuscaloosa has been a nightmare for me and my family.
My 84 years old mother who suffers from Parkinson has been hurt more by Servpro of Tuscaloosa than by the tornado that damaged her home earlier in the year.
My parents used Servpro to store furniture and electronics in order to cleanup and rebuild after the tornado. Furniture stored with Servpro was returned broken, damaged and electronic items like televisions and a crystal chandelier are missing. Six months after they were paid by the insurance company and four months after returning the damaged items Servpro owner Don Elmore has yet to make things right. They are so eager to drum up new customers that they don’t service their current customers. Their customer service stinks.

name: J.R. Cunningham
text:
Worst experience of a lifetime. Lost valuable jewelry, broke a tv, scarred furniture. I asked for them to pay for the things. The answer from Kevin Driggers was, "Mr. Cunningham don't wait for a check from us, if we paid every complaint we'd go broke."
That is about the only true statement I heard from ServPro. They are not members of BBB.
The owner Don Elmore's final word to me were, "just sue me, sue me, I have insurance, sue me."
In my opinion I would never again allow my insurance  company to employ this business, nor could I recommend anything good about them.

name: Charles Hawthorne
text: Very professional and courteous employees.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words toward our team!

name: Carl Noland
text: Ok

name: Mona Hardy
text: Nice

name: Katie Groom Balloch
text:
I had gifted myself a deep clean of my home for my birthday - and it was a wonderful gift! The team was prompt, efficient, and professional. They were so detail oriented - even folded the ends of the toilet paper and paper towels to a point - like Monica from Friends (haha!). I had hoped for that feeling from commercials were you see the sparkle when you walk in a clean room and you hear the *chime*, and I got it. They really worked as a team; I heard one of the gals ask how to do something, and another gal gave her a suggestion and even checked back to see if it worked. Very detail oriented.

They were also mindful of my working from home and my dog.

My place was cleaner than I even expected. Will recommend to everyone (I’m telling you, it’s Monica Geller clean), and I will definitely gift to myself again!

Shout out to Cierra, Latoya, and Kyla, the team I got. Thank you so very much.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to share your experience with our company on Google, Katie! We are so pleased to hear you were happy with our staff and service. We appreciate your recommendation!

name: Kelly Marshall
text:
Every detail about this service was exceptional. I have lived in my apartment for six years and let a few things get away from me when cleaning. I've never had someone clean my home before, so was a little nervous about the experience but I was immediately set at ease with the customer service at the office and the Maids who came to my home.
Every inch of my home was clean and I could tell they took their time with the most troublesome spots. Within seconds of opening the door, The Maids were off to work, making the absolute best use of their time. They were very friendly and went above and beyond.  I was very impressed and can't wait to book another cleaning!

name: Kelsey Cooley Sr
text: Came to the house like a foot ball team and got right to it. They left like family walking out the door. Great customer service!!!! Thanks all of you all from the bottom to the top of my family hearts.

resp.text: Kelsey thank you for taking the time to share your experience with our business on Google! We appreciate your business and look forward to cleaning for you again soon!

name: Christopher Coleman
text:
The only value this place gave me was knowing the value of my Ring camera. The "maids" came into my house stayed for 2 hours, charged $378 and stood around manipulating my thermostat. There were four people that came in, two that actually cleaned, one that stood and made sure the mop in her hand was upright and another that walked around with a vacuum strapped to her back for the entire time (nice hairdo by the way Pam).

The beauty of it was after they "cleaned", they left a note that they mopped three times when I watched them mop half the floor at best. All I can say is if you deal with this farce of a company, make sure you are aware of what you are getting into.

resp.text: Mr. Coleman – Thank you for using The Maids.  My apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced with our company.  We work hard to provide a professional, quality clean that we stand behind.  In fact, we have a 100% satisfaction guarantee.  I do not see your name in our records.  Please contact our office today, and we will be happy to send someone to your home to take care of anything we may have missed and be certain you’re completely satisfied with our service.  At The Maids, customer service is extremely important to us and we always strive for 100% customer satisfaction.  We look forward to hearing from you soon.

name: Brenda Carlisle
text:
I have been using The Maids for over 10 years.  I love my team who do a great job! I have had the same team for years with minimal changes. They clean my house perfectly. They know my pets and watch out for them. They have cleaned my carpets and my refrigerator too,  as extra requests. Kathy is always very responsive to my needs.
Great service!

resp.text:
Brenda,
The Maids has been taking care of your home since 2005!  I appreciate you sharing these kind words with others.   Please continue to let us know when you need extra services such as cleaning of windows, carpet, oven, refrigerator, etc.  We look forward to taking care of your home for many, many more years!  Kathy Senseman, Owner

name: S Howell
text: We are pleased with the cleaning the Maids have provided for us. They are friendly and complimentary. The past couple visits we have had a couple different teams  and would like to have our original team back. It is nice to have the same team you know and they know your likes and dislikes. Overall we are satisfied with the Maids work they provide us.

resp.text:
Sara,
Thank you for having The Maids take care of your home since 2014!   When clients are on an every four week schedule we try to have 2 teams who are familiar with the home.  Please continue to give us feedback on how we can make your cleanings even better!   Kathy Senseman, Owner

name: Ellen Strunk
text: My team is great!  They are flexible to my schedule and the team has been pretty consistent over the years.  Because of that they have had a glimpse into the ups/downs of our family and have always demonstrated a kindness that I so appreciate.  And yes! The house gets clean and spotless.

resp.text: Ellen,   Your family is like part of our "Maids" family since we have been taking care of your home for 7 years!  Thank you having us keep your home "clean and spotless"  for all of these years.  Kathy Senseman, Owner

name: Chairby
text: Team two is a blessing to me and my home.  They are so thorough and detailed!  They are kind and attentive and I really enjoy having them in my house.  Believe me when I say that with two college kids, a high school and a elementary school kids, the house is usually quite messy.  But they go about their business without complaining.  They are true professionals.  Many thanks team two!  By the way, I don't know why the post says, "That Guy Dino."  This is Cecile.

resp.text: Cecile, My team loves taking care of your home and watching your kids grow up!  You are also a blessing to The Maids family!  Thanks for sharing with others. Kathy Senseman, Owner

text: I've used The Maids at two different houses and have been with them for 10 years.  Team 1 led by Tammy is my team of choice!  They always do a good job and listen to special requests.  I never worry about leaving if they are here because everything is done right and the house is secure when they leave.  I love Team 1 and I hope The Maids treats them well because a team that does good work and is dependable is worth a lot to customers.

resp.text: Beth,  my team will be thrilled to hear your kind words.  Many thanks, for trusting us to take care of your homes during the many years!  Kathy Senseman, Owner

name: Tyler Hooper
text:
I am completely satisfied with The Maids!

My place is cleaned every time as if it is the first time - it is always left spotless. The ladies that clean my place are friendly, courteous, detail-focused, and respectful of my belongings. I get so much peace of mind knowing that the housekeeping is handled and I have more time to focus on other things in life.

The Maids is a very honest and reputable company. I've had a firsthand account of seeing this multiple times and it is a rare and very admirable thing today to see a business work so hard to make sure the client is 100% satisfied...going above and beyond when they didn't have to.

I've looked at other Birmingham cleaning services and none match the level of service and affordability that The Maids provide. I highly recommend The Maids to anyone that wants their home professionally cleaned every time.

resp.text:
Tyler,
WOW!  Thank you so much for your amazing remarks!  My team loves taking care of your loft downtown!  You are having the exact experience that I want each and every client to have.  Continue to share the word with your downtown friends and ask me about our referral program!  Kathy Senseman, Owner

name: Erica Lau
text: I scheduled an initial deep cleaning with The Maids, and did not rebook after the first cleaning. Overpriced and cleaning is average. They sent 3 people to clean a 2 bedroom + den apartment and it took over 2 ½ hours. After the cleaning, they called to let me know that they had accidentally gone over by 25 minutes wanted to charge me almost $100 over my initial quote. Needless to say, I have found a great housekeeper who can do all the work, in the same amount of time for ⅓ of the price.

resp.text:
Erica,
The price of our initial cleaning is always based on the size and condition of the property we are cleaning.  We give an estimate over the phone based on the client's information.  We offer a 100% unconditional guarantee.  I so wish you had chosen to have us stop back by if your cleaning was just average.  The Maids handles social security, workman's comp, insurance and bonding, health care, cleaning supplies, etc. therefore we cannot compete on price with individuals who do not have these expenses.  Please call me directly if I can be of assistance in the future.  Kathy Senseman, Owner

name: Susan Johnson
text: I can't do without The Maids! My grandson has severe allergies; and after they clean, all of the annoying allergens and irritants are gone!! These ladies are professional, thorough, and can outdo anyone on cleaning. They clean in places, I didn't even know I had places! I would much rather pay them than pay a doctors bill if I don't have them clean!

resp.text: Wow– Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with The Maids, Susan! We pride ourselves on providing the most thorough clean in the industry, and are glad you found that to be the case. Let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next experience with us even better!

name: Peggy Brashier
text: The Maids have been our home cleaning service for a number of years.  They do an excellent job in making sure my house is cleaned to my liking and they are very dependable.  The house is inspected by the Team Leader, Tammy,  before they leave and if something is accidentally missed, they go back and correct it before they leave.  I don't know what we would do without them.  Thank you The Maids.

resp.text: Peggy, our goal is to always leave your home exactly as you like it and in my husband's words "never leave anything for you to do after we are gone."  Many thanks for your review!  Kathy Senseman, Owner

text: I hired the Maids to deep clean my home prior to my family moving in. It was very expensive and I paid extra to have windows cleaned. I will not hire them again to clean my house after spending so much money with them to have a job not complete.

I wish you would have let us come back and honor our guarantee by taking  care of the areas of concern. text: They were very professional and courteousThey were very professional and courteous and didAnd did a very nice job

name: Janet E
text: Be very careful.  They ruined the finish on my brick floors and also made spots on hardwoods with a "new pre-treatment chemical" and a leaky container while cleaning my carpets.  Dodged me me for a month until I finally gave up and filed with BBB.  Never did get a call or reply from the owner.  And yes, I know him and know they've always had a good reputation. name: Supreme Storage
text: I can't begin to express how awesome this crew is. I have been in touch with the job supervisor more than any other vendor in the last 12 years at multiple facilities. They stay on top of the job, checking throughout to assure all is good. They did a great job cleaning and applying epoxy to our concrete floors within our facility. We are already looking into having them as a constant vendor for maintenance and other jobs. Check out the before and after pics. Thanks to Chris and his crew for a job well done!!

text: Excellent work, went above and beyond what I asked them to do for a very fair price.

name: Sam Stone
text: Great Job is all I can say very knowledgeable and througal and prompt attention to our needs

name: Marty Thomas
text: Call these guys

name: Larry Bradley
text: Supposed to be here at 9:30 am. Well, it's 11:45 am and no carpet cleaners.

name: A Friend
text: The Serv Pro crew did an excellent job. They were professional and very courteous. Arrived on time and cleaned up when they finished. The entire experience was very good. I highly recommend them to anyone needing this type of service.

name: Dominique Vickers
text: Ms. Jennie is hands down the best! She walks you through every inch of the process to make sure you have a complete understanding. Very professional and hands on! Highly recommend!

name: Mark Strong
text: Let me start by saying that this is the first time IN MY LIFE that I’ve written a bad review about a business, so the fact I feel strongly enough about this matter to do so should say enough in and of itself. Based off my family’s (ongoing) experience to-date with Servpro of Montgomery, I cannot and would not recommend this business to anyone. Mr./Mrs. Brooks, I kindly ask that you or someone in charge reach out to me in a timely manner.  As a courtesy and to give you a chance to address the issue, I will refrain from posting detailed information of surrounding incidents and the lack of professionalism and timeliness your company has exhibited thus far.  If I do not hear from anyone in a timely manner I will have to share my story in order to help future people hopefully never have to deal with the same issue(s).

resp.text:
Hi, Mark, I am the General Manager, and I am terribly sorry to hear about your family’s experience. We try to maintain the highest standards of service, but clearly that is not what happened here. Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Thank you,
Kerry Brooks

name: Lashanda Gaines
text: The entire staff was helpful. There wasn’t a doubt that I wouldn’t be taken care of. They were swift, efficient and thorough during this time.

name: Linda Ross
text: The Servpro representatives worked tirelessly to locate all the water damage and begin the drying out process.  They were professional and friendly, always answering my questions explaining each step as they were worked.  I highly recommend them!

name: Kelsea Garrett
text:
I’m at a loss for words as I write this review, but am hopeful that what happened to our family doesn't happen to someone else.

My grandmother had a horrible fall that was devastating to her life. My  Dad trying to do everything he could in that moment to comfort family took a beautiful handmade silk pastel Turkish area rug to have cleaned.

With loss of family in that moment you don't think clearly especially when it's unexpected.  The rug was dropped off; there was no proof of receipt provided at the time.

The rug is no where to be found and because there was no receipt provided no proof we were told nothing can be done.

Being the price of the rug and sentimental value alone we hired an attorney to contact the store owner, and unfortunately were told there was no proof.

I hope nobody else ever has to have the same experience. Please be sure if dropping off a high ticket item regardless of the emotional state you may be in to get an exchange of a paper trail, the employee’s name, and would even add to take pictures. Beyond disappointed in how the owners have handeled this situation with no effort at all to make any attempt for a resolution.

resp.text: SERVPRO® of Montgomery is sorry to hear of the traumatic experience you and your family have suffered. Knowing what you have been through, it saddens us to know that you feel we have mishandled one of your family heirlooms. As stated in your review, there is no paperwork showing it was delivered to us for cleaning. We value our customers and enforce stringent protocols and procedures for any items entrusted to us. This helps to avoid any confusion or loss. I would like to personally investigate this matter but will need additional information to do so. Please contact our office at 334-284-1612 and ask for Kerry Brooks.

name: Cassie Spears
text: Wish I could give y'all 10 stars!! SUPER prompt, SUPER professional, efficient, effective, and just all around amazing! Ms. Jennie in the office, you have my sincerest thanks! Y'all dispatched an incredible team! God forbid I ever have to have a COVID cleaning again, but if I do, I know who to call!!

name: Amanda Geddie
text: Very great company to hire !!!!!! They were clean and very professional during the whole process!!! Best you can get !!!

name: Dean S
text:
Do you own an older home? You might want to remove the built up dust in your heating/cooling ductwork.
ServPro is an expert cleaning service and the cost of duct cleaning is very reasonable.The technicians, Lamont and Shine showed up promptly at 9AM as scheduled and completed the cleaning in about 4 hours.
Now, the dust on the grilles is gone and air quality has improved. We are very pleased with this firm.Their technicians are thorough and professional.

name: Thomas Gaughran
text: Austin and Jon did an excellent job.

resp.text: Great to hear, we strive to please!

name: Linda Finney
text: The adjuster was very prompt coming to see damage. I was pleased and look forward to hearing start date.

name: Judy Van Luchene
text:
Several days after the house was empty, we stopped to see the progress...nothing.  For two weeks, we checked every
day, no workmen.  We were assured we would be back in by Christmas.  We went through three Project Managers, and
three different set of drywall and painters.  The first painting crew stood on my washer and dryer to paint the
ceiling in the laundry leaving dents and scratches.  We had stored the liquor from our bar in tubs in the garage,
as Servpro would not remove alcohol from the home.  Apparently the painters had found it and consumed a great deal
before they were removed from the job by Darin Ingle.  They also got paint all over our floors so Servpro brought
in commercial scrubbers which removed the finish on all of our floors.

To shorten this story, I will cut to the return home.  We finally returned to our home in early March with work still
going on, Painting and damaged floors. The first night home the water under the sink of my brand new cabinets
flooded the kitchen.  They had to send in dryers and a plumber who said it was not hooked up correctly and
reworked all of the kitchen dishwasher and sink plumbing. They sent in a professional flooring company  to assess
the floors. Their solution required us to move back into a hotel for at least a week so they could clean, reseal
the tile and recolor the grout.

The only thing that saved this project was Darin Ingle who arrived on the project in February.  Darin was sent in from another state to resolve the
problems at the Montgomery location that included our home.  Darin took the reins, brought in new crews and came
every day to ensure the work got back on track and that it was done correctly.  Darin's arrival was months into
the project and while we have never sued anyone, we were on the verge of doing just that to get another company
to come in so we could go home.  I am not sure if Servpro's executives realize that Darin not only saved our project,
saved them from a lawsuit but did an amazing job saving their reputation.  I would only call them again if Darin Ingle handled the job.
Because of Darin, I am giving Servpro a 2 star rating and Darin a 5.

An update to my review.  I was contacted by Mr. Bowen, an owner.  Mr. Bowen was determined to do something to do something for All we had been through.  He offered to send in a crew or something.  While his offer was appreciated, we had already fixed many of the issues and did not feel we could ensure another work crew I agreed to think it over and get back with him.  The one thing, as I explained to him, that distressed me everytime I went into the laundry was the dents and scratches on the tops of the washer and dryer which he eagerly agreed to replace.  With much of manufacturing shut down for long periods, appliances are in short supply.  However, Mr. Bowen and Darin Ingle were able to replace order And have new ones installed.  My frustration is no longer renewed when I walk into my laundry room.  My thanks to Mr. Bowen for reaching out and making this a better experience, and to Darin Ingle for making it happen.  It is good to know they cared to make things better.

resp.text:
Hi Judy, I am one of the owners and I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience. We try to maintain the highest standards of service, but clearly that is not what happened here. Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Thank you,
Bruce Bowen

text: I had a car with damage to the front seat and attempted to get an estimate.  Called several times a week for about two weeks with no answer.
