She ended up waiting around for quite a while before someone finally got to her, and the staff seemed rather annoyed that they had to take time out to talk to a customer.  They finally sent someone to look at the car, took some pictures, and told her they would get back to us in a couple days with an estimate.  He was pleasant and professional. That was 24 May. A couple weeks went by and nothing... tried calling multiple times and got no answer.  When someone finally answered, she was extremely unprofessional and quite rude.  We told her our situation, and asked the status of our estimate; she said the one who helped us was new, and that there was no way they were going to get back to us that fast, said it was going to be a while, but couldn't give us any sort of expected response time.  She was snappy, extremely rude, and pretty unprofessional.  19 June and still no response... pretty sure we're headed to Norm's out in Gurley.

text: I have come to this place for detailing many times and have always been satisfied, the staffs is friendly and professional, and the service is great. I have found early morning is best to save time. I will keep coming back.

name: George Mantis (G-Man)
text:
3 stars for Jones Vallley, 1 star for Madison, averages to 2 stars. The Jones Valley location used to be great. Now they can never even start on your car without at least 2 hours’ wait, regardless of time of day or how busy they are. Under their previous manager, they were fast and always professional, with never a problem. Not any more.

As for Madison... After 8 years of bringing my cars here and nowhere else, I will never do business with them again. I brought my car one day for a full detailing ahead of a lease return. My appointment was for 10am but I brought them my car at 9am. The receptionist told me it'd be done by close of business (5pm). I called at 4:30, and was told 6:30. Then it 6:00 they called to say 7:30. Then at 6:30 they asked if I could wait until tomorrow!?! They had my car ALL DAY and did nothing, even with an appointment. The owner offered only superficial apologies and lots of excuses - "we're very busy" (but I had an appointment!) "it's cold out" "we're not machines." Customers - especially repeat ones accustomed to excellent service - don't want to hear excuses.

name: Jon Bierer
text: Prices are great, service is great. Didn't know they were going to take my car to the wash rack next door to wash, so I was confused at first. They brought it back and detailed it. Looks beautiful.

name: TomKat Fleming
text: Very Disappointed! Using Groupon, I had 2 vehicles washed and waxed at the Jones Valley location  the same day. First, the positive: Both the young man and young lady who waited on us were courteous, friendly, and professional. The wax jobs appear good. The negative: on our SUV, the wax was applied over a non-clean roof and bug splats on the hood. We paid extra to clean the interior of each. This was not the $125 interior detail, just a $12.95 interior cleaning. Not sure what that was to include but since there was an attempt to clean the window and vacuum, I assume that was included. We removed all items from the car to make this easier. On our SUV, the carpet appeared vacuumed in some areas and "untouched" in others. On our sedan, the trunk was not touched. We left empty compartments open for vacuuming/cleaning; that didn't happen. On both vehicles, the seats were not vacuumed.  The interior side of the windows had streaks and smudges. We won't go back.

name: Tory Meeks
text: On the spot has always done a superb job on my truck. I let nobody else touch my truck except on the spot. The customer service is 10/10. The employees always put the customers first, which is something I love most about on the spot. I have been recommending them to everyone for a couple years and will continue to do so.

text: I took my car to their University Dr location about a year ago and had a great experience. Not so much at the one here in Jones Valley. I was told the day before that if I dropped my car off before 10am the next day it was guaranteed to be done by 1pm the same day. I wanted a full detail and a headlight scrub, they quoted me $115. I dropped it off at 9:45, and 1pm came and went. Around 4pm no one had called me. I called and they it would be done by 5, and that of course the 1pm was no longer guaranteed. I showed up at 5 and had to wait until 5:30 in the lobby. Then when I went to pay, they added on $65 to the headlight scrub, which was implied upfront would be a part of my detail job. This $65 quote was not on the original estimate, although it was notated they would clean the headlights. Not a fun time!

name: Vitaliy Didyk
text:
Terrible service,I've paid $150 and they didn't even vacuum under the seat or in the back of the trunk but did leave me with a nice dent on the door, they charge top $ to detail the car but seems to me like they don't even know the meaning of that word.
I would highly suggest not to go to that place?do it yourself you'll definitely do a better job and I promise you it won't take as long as it does with those guys

name: Richard Klimas
text:
Excellent business.
Professional, courteous and timely service.
My car didn’t look this good when I picked it up from the dealership, brand new !?!?!
Would highly recommend !!!!!
“ I’ll be back !!!!”

name: Brad McClellan
text: Not sure I'll be going back. The crevices aren't clean, the wax appears to have scratches that weren't there before

name: Forrest Tuttle
text: First time coming here and this place is amazing, I have never seen my car so clean!!!! This is the only place I will take my car for detail and washing for as long as I live in Huntsville.

name: Thomas Hatley
text:
Twice the attendant slammed my transmission into reverse while my car was moving forward.  After waiting in line for 20 minutes before my car was washed, another customer was allowed to pull up and have his car washed while he was sitting in it and mine was unattended.  I was in no hurry, and honestly don't believe saying anything would have gotten me anywhere.  After about an hour and 15 minutes, my car left only slightly cleaner than before it got there.

Simply put.  Avoid this place.  Believe me, I wish I would have.

Edit: I was at the Hughes Road in Madison location.  Cannot speak for the other one

name: Joe Pi
text:
I decided to have my vehicle detailed which they do for $199. I spoke with Brittney on the phone to get details of the work included and to make the appointment. To sum it up, everything except the engine! I made the appointment and wednesday was there at 8:30am as scheduled. No one was there. At approximately 9 am employees showed up and took my car. Inwas told that the credit card scanner wasn’t working so I would need to bring cash.

At 430 i called and was advised my car was done. When i got there I spoke with the man cleaning the exterior of my car. I asked if they cleaned the trunk jambs as I noticed a large deposit of mud when i got groceried the other day. He said yes. I then waited about 10 minutes for my car. I watched the man open the trunk and then wipe the trunk jambs...?

It was an overcast day and the car looked good... until I got home. My chrome exhaust was still black (i rubbed with my finger and it comes off), the fuel tank door was dirty (once again my finger lifted the dirt there), large spots on the chrome grill looked untouched, large spots on the lower door panels were untouched, smears on the windshield,and spots on the rims were untouched. I paid and their CC machine did work... amazing.

I have pictures and videos of all things I mentioned.

I was going to just leave it alone but knowing I paid $200 for a half a$$ job didn’t sit well with me.

I have to say the interior was GREAT! A little excessive with the oils but you can tell they took their time and got everything looking sharp!

On Friday i called and got Brittney on the phone again. I asked for a manager and she said she would relay a message for me. I told her I’m calling to complain about the detail I got... she asked for details and i told her everything. She called back a few hours later and advised that the owner/manager said i can bring the car back. I advised that i didnt have all day to leave my car to be washed and waxed again. (I highly doubt it was even waxed as there was so many spots that were unwashed... the wax would have stuck to it). I told her honestly the interior looked great and id be ok with paying for that service but need to be reimbursed for the remainder. She basically told me that wasnt an option and that thisnis how the manager handled things. He doesnt talk to customers and just has her. I explained that im offering to pay for the work that was done correctly... most customers would just want a total refund. However, if she cant authorize that and the manager wont even talk to me to settle the issue, ill just have my CC company cancel the payment.

I feel sad for Brittney as im sure she is put in this situation often.

My advice, stay away.

name: Leidy Aquino
text: On The Spot Is The Best Place to get your Auto detail ! I will definitely recommend them to everyone ! They will have your Vehicle looking Spotless! best customer experience ive ever had  !

name: Jeff Williams
text:
I wish I read read the reviews before buying.  I went to the small location on Hughes, and they did a horrible job on my car. I got the $60.00 "Supreme" wash. This is the first time I've paid to have my car cleaned and it will probably be the last.

There is a large section on my front bumper they missed. There was cleaning product pooled in my cup holders. It looked like they had just sprayed it on in places and never wiped it off. My dash and console was all spotty, and covered in a mix of dust and cleaning spray. They did not open my hatch and vacuum the back. The front was vacuumed but not well. There was a tone of very fine loose dirt  on my from floor mats. It looked like it came from the inside of the shopvac they used to vacuum the car. I can't believe they use a shopvac for this. I have leather seats, and they did not so much as wipe them down. My back seat had dirt in it from where I had sat a pair of boots. It's still there. There are little spots all over the outside of my car. I suspect that is from the spray wax they put on. I'm not sure.

The worst part is, my car has an odor now. It smells like body odor. I think that may be from the cleaning supplies they use. I don't know. I'm cleaning my car myself this week though. I've got to get the smell out. This place is horrible. I will never go back.

name: Jason Carter
text: Very friendly service. Fast and detailed. My car looks great!

name: Richard Ensley
text: This is the best detail job I have seen in along time, also their customer service was great.

name: Angela Whitlock
text: So I went to get my car seats and carpet shampooed (interior package). First of all, the package was 124.00!!! So right off the back I'm thinking they MUST be excellent at their job. I was sadly mistaken! I dropped the car off in the morning after making an appointment online. I asked the guy on duty about what time the car would be done. He said "about 1pm". I was cool with that. So I left and went to run errands. Around 1:30pm I called the place to find out the status. The woman who answered the phone put me on hold for over 5 min so I hung up and drove to the place to see how things were going. When I got there there was an older woman complaining about a previous job they did to her car. I just remember her saying "someone owes me 10 bucks to fix this". Anyway, one worker sees me and says "would you like to see your car?" I said yes and followed him into the garage. The car STILL had the dark brown stains on the carpets! Before I can point it out he says "I couldn't get it out. You should try dying the carpet." I was upset because the car also looked like they didn't vacuum well... if at all! Then there were dirt spots on my back window. The door jams were STILL dirty! The tires were dirty and the front bumper!  I ran my finger on both and lifted black dirt from those areas! They uses the wrong cleaning material on my middle console that caused paint to come off. I was very upset and dissatisfied snice I left it there for almost 6 hours already! I asked to speak with the manager. I told him this was no where near a good job for that price. After some deliberation, he agreed to knock off 25.00. This was a bit of a relief, but honestly, that was a 50.00 job (at best). THEN... about 2 hours later, that woman calls me back and says "your car is ready for pickup". I told her I already picked it up. She said "oh I guess I called the wrong person". I'm so annoyed with this place! They are so unorganized. Save your money and go elsewhere where they do a job that fits the amount that they are charging you. This was a waste of time. I would recommend Melvins On the Spot Car Wash in Florence, AL if you are in that area. He has had that business for 30 years! They know how to do it right and have better prices!

name: Pat Guettler
text: I won't take my car anywhere else. Great staff. Super attentive to detail.

name: john lang
text:
I read the reviews and was hesitant to buy a Groupon, but I'm pretty low maintenance, so I figured it would be fine. Nope.

3 hours turned in to 8 hours. We had scheduled a 9:00 appointment and I was on the road @ 5:05 after they completed the second car. Initially, they told me around 12:00. I had to kick up a fuss to even get them to begin after 3 hours.

They didn't vacuum the whole car until I asked them about it.

After I got home I discovered they hadn't even washed the roof of the SUV, much less waxed it.

While we were there they lost a center cap off of some guy's BMW. The best they could do was "sorry."

Even with a Groupon discount it was a waste of a day and not even worth the $130 I paid for two cars.

text: Great car wash they do a good job in a  timely manner don't have to watt long

name: Rachel Baines
text:
Absolutely terrible service. Save your money and go elsewhere!

I thought maybe the other reviewers were exaggerating a tad so I decided to give this place a shot and purchased a groupon. Now I'm out $60 and my car still looks terrible. Really disappointed.  Dealing with these people was a nightmare from the get go, and now I'll have to spend more money to take my car elsewhere and have it washed and waxed properly. Do yourself a favor and stay away.

name: Douglas Meeks
text:
I have 3 cars but I have a 2005 Freestyle that I use for hauling things (like my dogs) and it is never all that clean but one day recently I was picking up one of my dogs after a bath (black haired dog) and they had forgotten to brush him out good and I had a ton of dog hair all in my car and it was overdue for a cleaning.  I took it to On-The_Spot and the guy offered me a price that I thought was too low so I made him come out and look at the mess and he added like $10.  The thing is when they got finished several hours later and I came to pick it up it looked like a freakin' miracle it was so clean (close to new car clean) so I gave them a $20 tip and paid the fee gladly since I could never have done it and even if I had tried to do it myself the finished product would have looked like trash in comparison to the job they did for me.  5 Star service in my book

Douglas C. Meeks
Amazon Top 500 ​VINE ​Reviewer, Goodreads Top 1% Reviewer, Reviewer for  Wicked Scribes and Kindle Book Review

name: Katie Prude-Turner
text: On 12/12/2020, SS provided services to our hardwood floors. Before beginning, the floors were examined and we were told what needed to be done in order to give us the results we desired. The service was a bit expensive but we were willing to pay if we received clean and shiny hardwood floors. In the end, SS did an alright job but there is a problem area that looks way worse than it did before they performed services. I called and advised them that we weren't satisfied with the end result. They came out again and applied their SS product to the problem area but it didn't help. That area of the floor still looks horrible today...dull, ashy, and dry. I'm just going to buy a rug and cover it up. We weren't satisfied at all. I gave 3 stars because they previously serviced our carpets and they did a good job.

resp.text: Hi Katie, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. We do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We would like  to forward  this to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office that way if for some reason they are not aware of it they can look into this matter directly. Could you please email us with your zip code, cleaning address and phone number associated with your account at customerrelations@steemer.com . Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible.

I do not feel that they put a lot of effort and time into cleaning my carpet.

For the price of the service it was a completely awful experience and I will never use them or recommend them. Also, the smell I was trying to get out of my couch is still in the couch but only towards the middle. So the couch was cleaned better in some areas than other. I have a picture but for some reason it will not let me attach it right now. I will revisit this post to attach the picture.

The employees showed up 1.5 hours early without notifying me(said they tried to call which there is no record of on my only phone number) and did not have masks on when i answered the door. They reluctantly put them on when i insisted.
The price quoted was $317 but changed to $467 because the room was considered as two ( i had told the office it was large). I had worked for two days getting furniture moved so i went ahead and had the tile cleaned and sealed. Big mistake! While the guys were very pleasant,
The work they did was nothing spectacular and certainly wasn’t with over $400.
It was absolutely NOT worth my work and money to have my floor look no better than when i have done it myself with a steamer.
I will not recommend this to friends or family.

name: Jennifer Needham
text: DO NOT USE THEM FOR TILE CLEANING AND GROUT SEALING! Paid for tile cleaning and grout sealing. Crew had to come out 3 times in one day to attempt to fix and finish. First, they forgot to seal the shower that we paid $90 for them to do. Then, we noticed a film all over every single tile that would not come up; Technician did NOT allow the tile and grout to dry before spraying grout sealer..Then, did not wipe off the excess grout sealer, just left it all over each and every tile. 3rd trip out of same day to day to try and fix it, they used every chemical, scrubber machine, everything they had to try and get it off, guess what, didn't work. So now, my grout is wet UNDER the sealer, which never had proper curing time, because they did not let the grout dry before applying, and my tiles have giant stains, splotches, blobs all over every single one because they did not remove the sealer from the tile after spraying the grout. And on top of it, one of the technicians decided that no, all of my white grout was actually completely stained before they got here that's why it's dark (Not because it was wet, which was the case)..He ended up arguing with me and cursing at me. So corporate will be getting a call this afternoon. Floors look 10x worse than what they did before they were out. Mind you, this was over a $450 job.

resp.text: Hi Jennifer, thank you for taking the time to post a review about your recent experience using Stanley Steemer. We want you to know that we value you as a customer and are truly sorry that you have been inconvenienced in this way. We would like to learn more about your experience and to see if there is anything that we can do to restore your faith in Stanley Steemer. Please email us to customerrelations@steemer.com with your address, zip code and phone number associated with your account or contact us at 1-800-783-3637 ext. 4903. Once we have located your account, someone from management will be in contact with you. Thank you again for bringing this to our attention and we look forward to hearing back from you.

name: Rabecca Thomson
text: I have used Stanley steamer to clean my carpet for the last three years. This time two men came they did not want to move any furniture and said they will just go around it. ??? Um no !! I will move the furniture so it can be done right. The younger man had his pants down, hanging off his body. The whole time he was trying to spray the carpet his pants were falling and he could only use one hand. His shoe were not even tied. He did not use shoe cover and went in and out of the house. He was very unprofessional and I am not happy about the cleaning! I use this company because I trust them but never again. I will find someone else. The other man was ok.

resp.text: Good morning Rabecca, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. I had trouble finding your service yesterday because the last name was different but after locating it the management team was made aware of the issue. Rest assured that nothing has changed as far as our standards and it's unfortunate that you got that level of service, but we'll be working hard to ensure it doesn't happen again.

text: They were prompt and on time and called before they arrived as requested. I had the hardwood floor cleaning and after the holidays had glitter and a few stains still on the floor that I couldn't seem to get up and unfortunately they were unable to get it all up as well but my floors were definitely cleaner. The employees were awesome and a joy to work with. I would use them again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Latondra!    I'll be sure to pass this on to the team, and if you'd like us to come out and address those spots again please give us a call within 10 days of the service and there will be no charge.

name: Erin Boles
text: Very quick response time.  I requested carpet cleaning online and the next day, the cleaning crew was here on time, and I'd been given a courtesy call to make sure we'd be here.  Milton and his sidekick James were very courteous and thorough.  Plus, they were quick!  They finished 3 rooms in an hour!  They used plastic bumpers to protect the corners of our walls.  They also cleaned a very nice rug in our entryway.  I was concerned they might say they couldn't take the liability, but they cleaned it beautifully and quickly.  We've used Stanley Steamer for years, but haven't had carpet again until recently, and I'm pleased to say we'll use them again.

name: Kathy Carter
text:
Customer service was great when I called to schedule my carpet cleaning.  Very friendly and explained all cost and appointment details.  The two men they sent to clean my carpet were extremely nice and professional.  They were knowledgeable of all aspects of the cleaning and answered all of my questions.

Unfortunately, after the carpet dried, many of the stains came back which was very disappointing.  The men told me that they had used the strongest stain remover they had .  It obviously didn't work well enough.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know Kathy. If you reach out to the office first we would be able to hopefully address the issue before you leave an online review. I'll have a manager reach out to you and set up to have those trouble areas addressed. Please expect a call from 256-883-7800

name: Peggy Moore
text: There were here for 35 minutes.  I was outside when I went in to look the master bedroom was just as dirty from where the furniture was. I am not happy with in.  He brought the paperwork outside and had me sign it and they were gone.will not use again.  I’ve used before, never had that problem

resp.text: Hey Peggy, sorry for the late response on this; there seemed to be an issue with the email alerts for our reviews here! I've passed your information along to the regional management so you should be hearing from someone shortly regarding this issue. Please feel free to follow up here with your experience moving forward.

name: Denise Cook
text:
The very first thing I told the crew was that there were three cats in the house and they were not to be let outside. The next thing I knew they had my door standing wide open. This should have been communicated to me at the time of my warning so I could have locked up the cats at that time rather than going into mass panic.

I guess I was expecting too much from the tile cleaning. Though they spent a good two hours pre treating and then steaming the tiles didn’t look any better from when I used my own home steam cleaner, except in the areas where the washer and dryer previously sat in my laundry room.

resp.text: Hi Denise, thank you for taking the time to post a review about your service using Stanley Steemer. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are forwarding your concerns to the local franchise manager. That way if for some reason they are not already aware of it, they can look into this concern. Please email us to customerrelations@steemer.com and include your address, zip code and phone number associated with your account. That way we can be sure we are contacting the correct Stanley Steemer location. Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible. Thank you again for choosing Stanley Steemer.

name: Janet W
text: I am blown away at how amazing this company and it's employees are.  I had some damage to my ceramic tile and scheduled an appt over the internet.  The app said they were available at 8AM on Monday (and this was 8PM on Sunday.  I tried scheduling, thinking they would call and say they needed to set me up at another time.  Instead, I got a call at 8:10AM saying a team was on the way.  Dane and his partner were AWESOME.  They were worried that they would not be able to correct the damage I had done,  so Dane went into great detail about what to expect (he did not want me to be disappointed).  After much discussion, I told him to "go for it".  He did a superb job of fixing what I had messed up with his corrective cleaning technique.  He cleaned to rest of the floor sparking clean and fresh.  The results were much better than I expected and I am very happy with his hard work and diligence in making certain I was fully informed about potential upside and downside of the process.  It was quick, convenient and more than lived up to my expectations.  Would give this team and all of Stanley Steemer 10 stars if possible.

There was a little hiccup with the scheduling this go around so I’m giving 4 stars. I had an appointment between 8-10am. I got a call about 8:30 saying they will be here in 15-20 minutes. Well they didn’t show up until about 10:15. Other than that the technicians were polite, professional and did an awesome job. We will certainly be using them again.

name: Darin Bashaw
text: Watch their pricing and get quotes. They are already 50% more than competition for normal service. Deodorant or other add-ons will double the price. And if you dare to ask for tile or other hard surface cleaning and the price will be triple what carpets would cost. I was shocked by that bill. Didn't make sense so I asked and couldn't get a satisfactory reason why the hard surfaces were so much more expensive, except 'that's our price, that's always been our price.' Well these prices just don't seem reasonable to me. Otherwise, can't fault the service. As a commercial company, we need affordable and predictable prices and find these elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi Darin, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. In an effort to stay competitive Stanley Steemer monitors various consumer reports to help determine how their pricing compares. Although our pricing may not always be lower than our competitors, we are confident that they cannot match our quality of service. We are forwarding your concerns along to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office, that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this.

text: Service man was very polite. Did a great job cleaning. Only negatives are that we apparently had loose grout in one area in sunroom. Also, we had a discolored area, very small, in bathroom and in an attempt to be helpful, he tried to touch it up by matching the color of our grout, but color didn’t match, so we actually have a small area there now that is miss matched. Otherwise, everything looks great.

name: Richard Ziegenfus
text:
Carpet to be cleaned was original to our 2006 home, no kids no pets, just normal wear/tear. Kind of a neutral beige color.
The team of Milton & Tommy showed up on time (called 1st), very professional and friendly. They checked out the areas to be cleaned, asked if we had any special concerns (which we did and they addressed) and they went right to work. In what we considered a short time, they were done and invited us to inspect their work. Asked again if we had any concerns.
10-min later we had paid, they had picked up their equipment and were gone. Painless.
We WILL have these guys back to clean carpets in our motorhome.

name: Carli Parrish
text:
I just purchased a home and wanted the carpets cleaned before I moved my things into the home. I hired Stanley Steemer to come out on the day of closing. I could’ve rented a carpet cleaner from Publix and taken my time to clean my carpets and would’ve had a better result. I thought hiring professionals would save me time and I would have professionally cleaned carpets. Unfortunately that didn’t happen, they rushed and left dirty spots that I later cleaned myself. Not to mention they didn’t touch the areas around the base boards. I wasted over $300!
Update!
I received a call this morning and it’s was explained that my carpets had been neglected and that’s was why the carpets looked unclean. I really appreciate that fact that Stanley Steemer took the time to respond to my complaint!

resp.text: Hi Carli, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. We do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are forwarding this information along to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this matter and contact you directly. We have located your account information, to ensure we are contacting the correct location. Please email us at customerrelations@steemer.com (mailto:customerrelations@steemer.com) if you have any further questions or concerns. Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible. Thank you again for choosing Stanley Steemer.

name: Stacy Strain
text:
We hired them for one couch, one chair, and carpet in a vacant new house. Couldn't be easier. House only one year old. Rep on phone was not polite and not accomodating. When we arrived back after he completed work, there was zero change in the way the carpet looked, we found pins on surface of carpet that a good technician would have found. zero evidence of any cleaning. Called company back. Asked for another rep to come back and they said original rep had to. Company CONTRACTS for their work. Never recommend and never use again.

****ADDITIONS OR RESPONSES after owner response. The Rep referred to was not your wife, but the "contractor" that he said he was doing our carpet. Your wife (or person who scheduled our cleaning) WAS friendly on the phone. If you do not use contractors perhaps the "technician (rep)" shouldn't tell us that.  The stains and lackluster was noticed BEFORE we put any furniture back into the home. Plus, the guy who did the cleaning REQUIRED that we pay prior to the work and to him not the office. Not used to paying prior to work and wont again. Nothing I have said is intentionally false or misleading.  Still highly disappointed in work and don't believe in luck but do thank you for the intended kind ending comment.

resp.text:
UPDATED 10-1-20 after another false claim by Stacy. For anyone reading this....please visit our about us page on our website...https://www.goprosteam.com/about-us/   as you can see Cams' picture and bio are listed and have been on our website for years. Stacy, this is tiring to say the least.  Let me fill you in on a little nugget of information...the technician is not only our employee he is my stepson, so I think we know a thing or two that goes on in our company.  I mean for goodness sake Stacy...we have company vans with our logo, company name, address and phone number plastered all over it with an expensive van wrap...do you think any company is gonna let a "contractor" drive their company vans?  They are not, so again, either you are confused or making this stuff up for whatever reason you have...not sure...maybe you are just having a bad week...still no reason to dump all over us. The reason you were required to pay upfront is because both you and your husband were leaving the house, this is company policy..otherwise if a customer stays they pay after work is completed.  Also...if Cam left a busines card with our logo all over it, it says his title "OPERATIONS MANAGER".  We have already asked Cam about his experience with you, as a matter of fact the only communication he had with you was on the phone when he called to ask a few directions to your home while he was on the way...you were not even there when the cleaning intially started, your husband was...so no Cam has no reason to tell you he is a contractor.  By the way....you did not pay Cam, he carries a credit card reader that is mobile, you were charged by my company...would you like to see a copy of the receipt?  Ive been more than nice to you over this but you keep making false claims.  Again I appreciate your business but please stop this...it is making you look foolish.  Once again we wish you all the luck in your new home.

Hi Stacy.  This is Matt Lowery, co owner and founder of Pro Steam Carpet Care.  First let me say it is unfortunate that you feel the need to leave such a false review of our company.  Secondly here is the url to our about us page on our website  https://www.goprosteam.com/about-us/  as you can see it has Cams' bio on there and states he is our OPERATIONS MANAGER, not a contractor so let me clear some things up for you.  Firstly...the "rep" on the phone is my wife and gets compliments daily on how helpful, resourceful, nice and educated she is, the "rep" that cleaned your carpet and furniture is an employee and has been employed with us for 8 years with zero complaints, only praised because he cares.  We are a family owned business and have been for 30 years.  Secondly...you claim we "contract"  for our work....sorry but that is false and misleading.  We do not use contractors..we use employees.  We refused to send a different technician because your husband called us approx 4 days after the job was completed and after you had moved in due to a "stain" reappearing.  We were more than happy to reservice your carpet at no charge but the technician who originally cleaned your carpet was already familiar with your carpet and had absolutely no problem in returning to satisfy you....I found it odd that your husband called back and canceled the reservice of your carpets.   We do have before and after pics of your furniture, they are like night and day and cleaned up perfectly.  If I am able to post the pics to this response I will.  I do however have a suspicion that since we performed the carpet cleaning BEFORE you moved in that during your moving process there was probably some soiling that occured....this is common, however it is still unfortunate you feel the need to leave a 1 star review.  We agreed to return to reservice your area and you refused.  We are a good, generous and honest company with many certifications and one of the only firms that is insured in the area.  We appreciate your business and wish you luck with your new home.

name: Adrienne G
text:
I have pets, 2 dogs to be exact.  I had friends stuck at my house during the height of COVID-19 with their 2 dogs.  Four animals in an 1100 sqft house for 7 months.  You get the picture.  Guest just left last month and I am still trying to clean up after all have left.  So I decided to refinance my house.  Then I received a call that my home needed an appraisal for my refinance.  Ok, no big deal, except the appraiser would be here in 1 week.  I needed my carpets cleaned FAST.  Panic set in when ALL my normal carpet cleaners in Newnan were unavailable until after appraisal date.  So, I searched for companies in LaGrange and read the reviews.
Pro Steam seemed like the best option.  I called and Ali was able to get me on their schedule same week.   Price was affordable, in my budget and primarily fit my time constraints.  Cam arrived on time, went over the house and was very thorough.   I really appreciated how quick Ali was able to get me scheduled due to extremely tight timeline. I was amazed that the products they used smelled refreshing AND DID NOT bother my sinuses at all!!!   That is saying something because glass cleaner will make my nose burn.  My carpets look like new, all the little "oops" stops are gone, house smells AMAZING.   Cam was here about 2 hours and I was able to continue working while my carpets were cleaned, even had a few calls and no issues at all with noise.
So, if you are looking for carpet cleaners, this local owned company is AWESOME!!!  Thanks, Adrienne G.

resp.text: Adrienne, thank you so much for your business.  We are glad you are happy and delighted with the cleaning and we were able to accommodate your time frame.  Give us a call anytime you need anything, we appreciate you.

name: Leah Klimchak
text: Max Care Pro Carpet and Tile did a stellar job last week when they serviced (2) area rugs and our upstairs carpet! Godfrey and Russell arrived on time, in fact early for our appointment, and took time to walk through the house to determine the areas that needed servicing with me to ensure we were on the same page. Next, Godfrey and Russell quickly got to work and began servicing all needed areas. They worked both quickly and efficiently, and after their service the carpets looked and smelled clean and new! Their system to pay was also time efficient and hassle free, as we were able to easily pay with their portable card reader. In addition, Godfrey came prepared with a printed receipt and emailed a copy as well for our records. Our appointment concluded with Godfrey providing two chocolate chip cookies thanking us for being a customer! I don't know about you, but I feel that GREAT service AND delicious cookies is surely a powerful duo!!! We highly recommend Max Care Pro Carpet and Tile - you will not be disappointed!

name: Juliana Morgado
text: Their system was organized & sent daily text messages leading up the appointment (day & time reminders), which is super helpful when you have so many other things going on during a move. They were very communicative day-off, as well, so we knew exactly when to meet them. The carpets look amazing after the job, & the entire house (which is half carpet/half hardwood) smells incredible! Definitely recommend!

name: Heather Posey
text: Max Care has the BEST customer care EVER!!! I have been a repeat customer for years because of the service, quality, and staff. There is never a long wait to have your carpets cleaned and they've always worked around my schedule.

name: Michele Rogers
text: Max Care Pro cleaned our Living Room carpet and the tile in our Kitchen and Hearth room.  The  results were amazing.  Grape cranberry stain came out of the carpet and the grout & tiles look like they did when we first moved in.  Godfrey & Russell are an phenomenal team and get things done quickly and are very professional.  They have been our go-to carpet and tile cleaners for the last 20 years.  We HIGHLY recommend them.

name: Kellie D.
text: I have used MaxCARE for years and I am always amazed at how they can revive my carpet. I love that the owner (Godfrey) and his longtime manager (Russell) personally come to your home and are the ones doing the cleaning. They really care about customer satisfaction and take their time doing each step right. We recently put our house up for sale and called MaxCARE to schedule a whole house carpet cleaning. Our 16 year old carpet looked so bright and clean that, I kid you not, one person told the agent showing the house that they were surprised we did not mention in the MLS listing that we had recently replaced the carpet. WOW!! I highly recommend this company!! Their prices are hard to beat and if you find anything lower, you'll probably get what you pay for. They are always on time and extremely professional because again, you are only dealing with the owner and he cares about his business and his reputation. They take their time and make sure they go over stains and high traffic areas more than once. They also gave us chocolate chip cookies when they were finished! Now I know this has nothing to do with cleaning the carpet, but it is a really nice touch and they were so delicious!! Thank you Godfrey and Russell for always doing such a great job cleaning our carpet! We will be using MaxCARE for all our carpet cleaning in our new home.

resp.text: Kellie,  Thank you so much for your recommendation!  We appreciate your business and always love customer feedback!  Looking forward in taking care of all your cleaning needs in the future. Thanks again, Godfrey McNeely

Hi Mr. Coast
This is Godfrey McNeely owner of MaxCARE Carpet Cleaning .  I see that you gave us a 1star rating so I checked my records and I could not find that we have ever provided cleaning service for you.
We are committed to providing the highest quality professional cleaning available.  Our technicians use the most technologically advanced equipment, and our cleaning methods and standards are the highest in the industry.  Anything but a 5 Star rating is a disappointment to us.  If we have cleaned for you under a different name please let me know?  We do have a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.
Sincerely,
Godfrey McNeely

name: Colby Duckett
text:
I used rainbow international to help with a moisture condensation issue in my crawlspace that caused some water damage to the floor as well as some mold growth in the crawl space. They were very responsive and professional throughout the inspection, estimate, and remediation process.

They gave me appropriate information to help me determine what option was the best quality and value for my specific situation.

They performed a mold remediation treatment, installed a dehumidifier in the crawl space, replaced the crawl space door, and sealed the crawl space vents with cover that I provided, and all for a very reasonable price.

I would certainly use Rainbow International again for a situation similar to this one, and I would recommend their serviced to others in this situation as well.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr Duckett! While we hope you don’t Need our services again, we’re Always Here for any Water,Fire, or Mold disasters anyone may have.

text: Heaven's Best came highly recommend and lived up to every expectation. They were on time, very personable, and reasonably priced. I will call them again!

name: Tracy Colvin
text: Steve came to my house, and spent at least 30 minutes loving on all of my 6 small dogs...they loved him!!😀  What a nice guy!!  He cleaned my carpet very professionally, and it dried very quickly!!  He did an awesome job! And cheaper than the other expensive company here in Birmingham that gouges with outrageous costs!! I will definitely use him again and again!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to give us a review!  We love dogs at Heaven's Best Carpet Cleaning.  That is one of the reasons we started this business.  We have 2 mini dachshund's and we love them, but we don't like some of the messes they make.  We realized that there are many people just like us, who love their pets and need help cleaning their carpets at an affordable rate.  We understand that budgeting is often tight, so we try to give a good value for our services.  We would love to clean for you again and I am sure Steve would love to visit with your dogs again.  Thanks again for letting others know!  We are definitely a pet-loving company!

name: Lyndsay Blohm
text: They did such an amazing job!  They were very professional, but also very friendly.  My couch smells wonderful and it didn't take long at all.  The price is the best around and they are very thorough.  I am going to ask them to come back and do my carpets soon.  I highly recommend Heaven's Best!

resp.text: Hi Lyndsay, Thanks so much for letting others know about our service! We are so glad to hear from another happy customer. Please call us when you are ready to have your carpets cleaned. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review! Ann & Steve Mobley

text: Great company with great people. They do a fantastic job and stand behind their work! We have been using them for a few years and I would not use anyone else! I feel like they are a part of the family. Stephen is one of the nicest people I know.

resp.text: Thank you so much for letting others know about our business!  We do think of you and all of our customers like family. And, we love your dogs too! We appreciate you taking the time to review us! Ann & Steve

name: Brandy Waters
text: We were moving & desperately needed our carpets cleaned (2 small kids, 2 dogs & a cat - you can imagine the damage), but we were on a short time frame. With only a few days notice, these guys came out & deep cleaned our carpets AMAZINGLY! Seriously, our house looks SO much better thanks to them! I’ve never had the pleasure of interacting with a company with such exceptional communication skills either! They emailed/texted to confirm my appointment, called/texted when they were on the way (100% on time, btw) and went over every detail of our bill BEFORE beginning so we wouldn’t be surprised by anything. If you need your floors clean, you can’t go wrong by choosing them!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your AWESOME GOOGLE REVIEW!  We love to hear that we did a good job and that we communicated well throughout the cleaning process.  And, we strive to make our customers happy and to live up to our name "Heaven's Best" every time we clean!  So, we are glad to hear that we are getting the job done. We will pass your comments on to our technicians who are rewarded for their hard work. Thanks for your business & review! We hope to clean for you again! Sincerely, Steve & Ann Mobley - Owners

text: Steve is truly Heaven's Best when it comes to carpet and upholstery cleaning in the home and office. His attention to detail and efforts to complete a beautiful job are second to none. resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review on us! We try to give great service to all our customers. And, we pay attention to detail and take extra if needed to ensure we do the best possible job. Thanks again!

Along with getting out spots and stains, they have that light citrus lemon scent that smells really good.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to let others know about our services. name: J C
text: Ridiculous. First, you play phone tag with a person for a day then they want to come and measure each square foot of carpet to be cleaned which required me to drive 30 miles to the home,which in the end was a waste of time. Then because a 10 foot square area of carpet had some heavy staining this person proceeds to give me an at least $1000 estimate and several days away till job is done! I dont care what you do to a carpet you're not going to get all the stain down into the pad out I don't care what someone tells you,short of replacement. Charging attorney fee rates is ridiculous, you're cleaning carpet for 2 or 3 hours without going to law school for 6 to 8 years. In my opinion he just didn't want to do the job. Also wanted like $1.15 a sq. ft to clean tile with over 500 ft. to be done. Again, it ain't that difficult and those prices must be from New York or Cali. After the rigamaroll I contacted another carpet cleaner,gave the number of rooms and approximate area to be cleaned OVER THE PHONE and they were out that afternoon, did a good job in 3 hours all for about $300.

name: Andrew Godfrey
text:
They cleaned the carpets and they look better than they have vs any other service that has cleaned here. Having said that...

The technician/salesman will show up and try to sell you a ton of services that they will give you a great deal on because they are your friend. Decline all of it. The enzyme treatment, pretreatment, post treatment, etc.seem to largely be imaginary. I signed up for some but they did not modify what they were doing at all.

Also they will not move or clean under any piece of furniture that you do not EXPLICITLY ask them to clean under, so keep an eye on the work and speak up; they wont do anything they don't absolutely have to on their own.

Having said all of that, the carpets look great.

name: Rubies Girls Program
text: Technicians were very polite and professional, but my complaint is that my credit card  was billed twice and once I called the office and spoke with Patrica she informed me that they noticed that and has credit my account  which will take 2-3 days, after noticing I have more transactions pending and and this will place my account NEGATIVE she stated she had no control over how long it take to process. I asked to speak with a manager (Megan) who stated the same thing so nonchalantly offered to send me an email of the transaction, she also stated the technician shouldn’t have taken my payment, and again how is this my fault as a customer! All she offered a useless apology and will send me an email. How does this help my account with my financial facility. Needless to say I will NEVER use them again nor will I recommend them.

name: Delmonica Washington
text: I have had my carpet cleaned numerous times and I've never had anyone or any company clean as though as Aiden and Justin.They were very friendly and courtious.Outstanding service.Thanks Stanley's Steamers my carpet and grout looks amazing.

name: joann thomason
text: Chris and Dustin were very professional and did a great job with our carpets, tile,and our sectional.

name: lil jay Jay
text: The two guys that came to our house was very professional and courteous. They did an amazing job

name: Meno T
text: Always professional and courteous. My house is so clean now!!!!  Thanks guys!!!

name: Andrea Lynn
text: Chris n Aiden cleaned carpet, n did a very good job.... Carpet looks 👍🏾

name: Chris Thomason
text: Under new ownership and striving to provide the best customer service and results to the Mobile Alabama area! Give us a shot if you havent already!

name: Patty Gillis
text: Stanley Steemer came out to do a few rooms.  It looked good until it dried.  They graciously came back out and commented that the "streaks in the carpet, possibly due to clogged jet during initial cleaning" and cleaned the problem area again.  Note that we do have pets/pet stains, but the streaks are still visible and in different places the same width of the equipment they used.  We gave Stanley Steemer a try and think we will go back to another carpet cleaning service.

name: Jeared Layton
text: Didn’t move furniture as promised, didn’t clean under rugs, didn’t do a closet they were asked to do. Won’t give a refund. I had family coming in the next day and rented a cleaner and cleaned it at midnight. I called to complain, the manager won’t call me back and the lady on the phone was rude!

name: TAMMY McCLOSKEY
text: Prices to high

name: Ryan Baker
text: I've used Stanley steemers multiple times and they always meet or exceed my expectations. Great work at a great price!

name: Thomas Bialorucki
text: Austin and Jimmy cleaned our carpets today and the wife and I are very pleased with the outcome. We will be using them again

name: jesse hazwood
text: Very good work.

name: David Coffman
text: Great 👍

name: Nikki Harwell
text: The staff was very friendly.

name: Jane Nall
text: It is Monday 3 pm and no one answers phone and equipment is not allowing me to leave message.

name: laurie ledlow
text: I hired Southern Carpet Care to clean several area rugs with pet stains and a sectional sofa. They arrived on time and professionally dressed and were attentive to every problem area I addressed with great detail. The customer service was phenomenal and the price was very reasonable. I would definitely suggest using their service me and my husband where very pleased and will be calling them back!

name: Michael Hamel
text: This company is properly named, as they do ok with cleaning your carpets, but do NOT pay for this company to do any other cleaning, especially a "deep cleaning". Attached are pictures of my house I rent out after they "cleaned" it, as well as the combative e-mails between myself and the owner, where I provided the owner with the details of my unsatisfactory along with photos (posted below) the day after, requesting a manager to come by the house ASAP. Instead, the owner wanted a statement from the person on site at the time. The e-mails are also posted below. $480 to only get my carpets cleaned in 4 rooms of a very small house... Sad.

name: Travis Willard
text: Hired SCC to clean a couch, loveseat & chair. I informed them that I had 2 dogs, and needed a thorough cleaning. Dark tweed material. They didn’t even vacuum the couch. The sprayed it with something then used a electric buffer to rub it in. That’s it. $185 for less than 30min of work that didn’t include steam cleaning or even vacuuming like you would think a carpet/upholstery company would provide. Do not book without them telling you exactly what they’re process is and be sure to hold them to it.

name: pink diamond
text: Great job!  Bravo to Mike and Azzie very knowledgeable and they made my Carpet shine again.  I will definitely use Southern Carpet Care again and really enjoy recommend to friends.

name: Lol ClapzIQ
text: We recently moved from Alabama and was in a rush and the people that were coming to do the cleaning never showed up. Got to miami and had to find someone else myself just going by the reviews and google. Called and spoke to Vickie. She made me feel super comfortable and went above and beyond to help me. So grateful for all her help and professionalism. Highly recommend them. And by the way did I mentioned did the Job ASAP. Paid over the phone and also offered to help me find a landscaping person for us. So thankful that there is still great people out there who care about there customers not just their money. And the price was just right!!! God bless your business. Once again Thank You 🙏 😇😊

name: Joshua Brown
text: Had Southern Carpet Care of Mobile come out and clean our carpets at my Trampoline park. They did a great job, I highly recommend them for commercial use. Friendly staff, and reasonably priced.

name: Gina Warren
text: This business has cleaned my carpets about four times now. I have older pets and four teens that create havoc on my carpets but they perform miracles each time I call!   Timely, professional and personable! Highly recommend!

name: Paula Greer
text:
Professional, well dressed, groomed. Reasonable.  Easy to work with.
Did a great job!

name: Sam Adams
text: On time service, knowledgeable operator, and carpets cleaned with no residue or lingering odor.  The price is competitive, so i recommend Southern Carpet Care.

name: Charles Erwin
text: Southern Carpet Care has cleaned carpet in several of our commercial rental properties.  Vickie and her crew do excellent work at reasonable prices.

name: Mary McCall
text: They are the best you can't go wrong please  call them

name: Peggy Hulcher
text: Great job! Friendly staff!

name: Mike Winchester
text: Superb job by Heaven’s Best Carpet Cleaning.  Irvin and Frederick were highly punctual, pleasant, and professional.  They cleaned our four bedrooms/closets, and loft carpets and restored their newness.  We were prepared to write off and replace our master bedroom carpet but it came out looking great-even with 15 years of use and the occasional pet accident.  Thanks also to Miss Rochelle who scheduled the booking. The company demonstrates trust and integrity.

resp.text: Clean Supreme with our Heaven's Best Carpet Cleaning department, wants to  thank you for allowing our team to save your carpet.

name: Bryan Brazelle
text: Courtney and her team went above and beyond to make sure that the house that we were about to put on the market was exceptionally clean! Attention to detail was very impressive. Highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  We loved working on your beautiful home.

name: T J
text: I found Courtney and her team at Supreme Clean LLC, a Veteran owned and operated business, to be Extremely Responsive and Professional. I had to change my appointment several times due to schedule and Courtney was very understanding. The team provided a Quality Cleaning for my property which I was having detailed cleaned between tenants.  They even went further to follow up the next day on some grout cleaning to ensure that it looked good after it dried.  Thank you Supreme Clean for your hard work!

resp.text: You're welcome and thank you for choosing  Clean Supreme 😊

name: Robert Pierce
text: The absolute best carpet service. Very professional, prompt and excellent service. I have used them many times at several different houses and they are the best!

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to care for your carper.

name: Monique Harris
text: Clean Supreme provided me with the best service  I have ever experienced. From the minute Courtney answered the phone I was met with  great customer service. I cannot say enough about this business.  We had the unique situation of having rodents in our vehicle (yuck). Until I found Clean Supreme, burning the car was the only option. Because of the situation, regular detailing was not sufficient for us. We needed someone with experience in this area. After talking with her she immediately reassured me that she could take care of the problem, since she has experience with rodent infestations in hoarder situations. She was  knowledgeable, professional, and the service was spotless. I would certainly utilize this business again for any cleaning need.  If there was an option to give 6 out of 5 stars I would do it.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We definately wanted you yo have a pleasant experience from an unpleasant situation.

name: Alex Williams
text: Absolutely great Cleaning and service!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ They did a fantastic job and left my carpets looking amazing. They were professional and super nice! Thank you for handling the rugs and the puppie accidents that needed attention! Great job overall experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  We wish you and the puppy well. If ever you need us again, we hope to satisfy you.

name: Tess Healey
text: Crew did an amazing job. Recommend for sure!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our services.  We look forward to working with you on a long-term basis.

name: Light House Cleaning Company LLC
text: Very Professional!! Awesome Customer Service I HIRED THE CLEAN SUPREME Permanently for My company. Also they have the most responsible rates around town

resp.text: That you Ms. Jemison. It was a pleasure serving you.

name: Pollie Wells
text:
Clean Supreme is an excellent cleaning service! Courtney and her team are thorough, honest, and a pleasure to work with! My first point of contact was with Rochelle. She always returned my phone calls and answered all my questions in a prompt and professional manner. We accessed all of their cleaning tools which included a complete cleaning of every surface from top to bottom (even windows inside and out), Heavens Best Carpet Cleaning, and the ionization odor removing process. Courtney went above and beyond to make sure our house was sparkling clean and fresh and ready to put on the market! I can’t say enough about these wonderful ladies!
If your looking for an honest and thorough cleaning service for a great price look no further than Clean Supreme!

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Pollie for allowing us to be of service.

name: Camille Kibler
text: I have used this company for the last 6 years to clean my commercial properties and I am VERY satisfied with the quality of their work! They are my ONLY choice for cleaning services.

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to be your vendors. May we continue to give you a 5 star cleaning of all of your establishments

name: MaryLou Dawson
text: Best cleaning team I've ever had; hands down ;professional, friendly.  Go above and beyond. I'd hire them again anytime.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Mary Lou. We appreciate your business. Hoping all is well.

name: Jah MaineMan
text: Simply the most detailed clean for your buck. Amazing personnel and services offered to residential, commercial, and government clients. These guys & gals do a thorough job!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your comment. We are happy to have served you

name: Mark Cordy
text: There are cleaning companies and there is Clean Supreme. Hands down, the most competent, professional cleaners in the Huntsville area.

resp.text: Thank you, we strive for excellence. I must say, OUR TEAM ROCKS!!!!
